abso: 本发明提供了一种精细目标识别方法和系统，涉及图像处理技术领域，其中，提取待识别图像的特征描述，生成目标显著图；通过所述目标显著图对所述待识别图像进行处理，得到所述待识别图像的目标候选区域；检索所述待识别图像的K近邻图像，并对所述K近邻图像进行处理，得到所述K近邻图像的目标候选区域；计算所述待识别图像的目标候选区域和所述K近邻图像的目标候选区域的相似度；根据所述相似度以及K近邻图像的目标候选区域之间的相似度之和，确定所述待识别图像的精细目标区域。从而实现不需要对待识别图像进行强标注，就能够对精细目标进行描述，节省了大量的时间和人力，提高了精细目标的识别效率。
tie: Fine target identification method and system
absc: 本发明提供了一种精细目标识别方法和系统，涉及图像处理技术领域，其中，提取待识别图像的特征描述，生成目标显著图；通过所述目标显著图对所述待识别图像进行处理，得到所述待识别图像的目标候选区域；检索所述待识别图像的K近邻图像，并对所述K近邻图像进行处理，得到所述K近邻图像的目标候选区域；计算所述待识别图像的目标候选区域和所述K近邻图像的目标候选区域的相似度；根据所述相似度以及K近邻图像的目标候选区域之间的相似度之和，确定所述待识别图像的精细目标区域。从而实现不需要对待识别图像进行强标注，就能够对精细目标进行描述，节省了大量的时间和人力，提高了精细目标的识别效率。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of fine target identification method and systems, are related to technical field of image processing, wherein the feature description for extracting images to be recognized generates target significant image；The images to be recognized is handled by the target significant image, obtains the object candidate area of the images to be recognized；The k nearest neighbor image of the images to be recognized is retrieved, and the k nearest neighbor image is handled, obtains the object candidate area of the k nearest neighbor image；Calculate the similarity of the object candidate area of the images to be recognized and the object candidate area of the k nearest neighbor image；According to the sum of the similarity between the similarity and the object candidate area of k nearest neighbor image, the fine target area of the images to be recognized is determined.Images to be recognized is marked by force to be implemented without, it will be able to fine target is described, a large amount of time and manpower are saved, improve the recognition efficiency of fine target.

abso: 本发明公开了一种位移调节装置、用于无人机的电池固定器以及无人机，该位移调节装置包括导向件、挂件以及止动螺钉，导向件开设有滑槽，挂件设置有能够在滑槽中滑动的滑轨，滑轨伸入滑槽的部分开设有若干齿，若干齿沿滑轨延伸方向排列，止动螺钉安装在导向件上，并通过旋转能够伸入滑槽中以卡设在滑轨的两齿之间。安装在挂件上的零部件借助滑轨在滑槽内滑动可进行位置调节；并通过止动螺钉的头部旋入到滑轨的两齿之间对挂件以及安装在挂件上的零部件进行固定，进而满足机械的装配要求以及重心调节要求。该位移调节装置结构简单、调节灵活，加工方便。具有上述位移调节装置的无人机能够方便调节整体重心。
tie: Displacement adjustment device, cell holder for UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle) and UAV
absc: 本发明公开了一种位移调节装置、用于无人机的电池固定器以及无人机，该位移调节装置包括导向件、挂件以及止动螺钉，导向件开设有滑槽，挂件设置有能够在滑槽中滑动的滑轨，滑轨伸入滑槽的部分开设有若干齿，若干齿沿滑轨延伸方向排列，止动螺钉安装在导向件上，并通过旋转能够伸入滑槽中以卡设在滑轨的两齿之间。安装在挂件上的零部件借助滑轨在滑槽内滑动可进行位置调节；并通过止动螺钉的头部旋入到滑轨的两齿之间对挂件以及安装在挂件上的零部件进行固定，进而满足机械的装配要求以及重心调节要求。该位移调节装置结构简单、调节灵活，加工方便。具有上述位移调节装置的无人机能够方便调节整体重心。
abse: The invention discloses a displacement adjustment device, a cell holder for a UAV (unmanned aerial vehicle) and the UAV, wherein the displacement adjustment device comprises a guide piece, a hanging piece and a stop screw, the guide piece is provided with a sling chute, the hanging piece is provided with a sliding rail capable of sliding in the sliding chute, the part, extending in the sliding chute, of the sliding rail is provided with a plurality of teeth, the plurality of teeth are arranged along the extending direction of the sliding rail, and the stop screw is arranged on the guide piece, and can extend into the sliding chute through rotating so as to be clamped between two teeth of the sliding rail. Parts mounted on the hanging piece slide in the sliding chute by virtue of the sliding rail to perform position adjustment; the hanging piece and the parts arranged on the hanging piece are fixed through screwing the head part of the stop screw to be located between the two teeth of the sliding rail, and further to meet mechanical assembly requirements and gravity center adjustment requirements. The displacement adjustment device is simple in structure, flexible in adjustment, and convenient to process. The UAV provided with the displacement adjustment device can conveniently adjust the overall gravity center.

abso: 本发明公开了一种检测硫化氢的荧光纳米探针及其制备方法与应用。该荧光探针由含氮元素的碳量子点与纳米银的水溶液通过简单混合而成。本发明将碳量子点?纳米银荧光探针组装后，进行表征、优化检测硫化氢的实验条件。后进行对硫化氢的线性检测以及干扰物分析，最后可应用于实际生物样品中硫化氢的检测分析。该荧光探针检测硫化氢的灵敏度、稳定性优良，检测低限达91pM，并可用于实际样品硫化氢的检测。
tie: Fluorescent nanometer probe for detecting hydrogen sulfide and preparation method and application of fluorescent nanometer probe
absc: 本发明公开了一种检测硫化氢的荧光纳米探针及其制备方法与应用。该荧光探针由含氮元素的碳量子点与纳米银的水溶液通过简单混合而成。本发明将碳量子点?纳米银荧光探针组装后，进行表征、优化检测硫化氢的实验条件。后进行对硫化氢的线性检测以及干扰物分析，最后可应用于实际生物样品中硫化氢的检测分析。该荧光探针检测硫化氢的灵敏度、稳定性优良，检测低限达91pM，并可用于实际样品硫化氢的检测。
abse: The invention discloses a fluorescent nanometer probe for detecting hydrogen sulfide and a preparation method and application of the fluorescent nanometer probe.The fluorescent nanometer probe is formed by simply mixing carbon quantum dots containing the nitrogen element with an aqueous solution containing nanometer silver.According to the fluorescent nanometer probe and the preparation method and application thereof, after the quantum dot-nanometer silver fluorescent probe is assembled, representation is conducted, experiment conditions for detecting hydrogen sulfide are optimized, then linear detection and interferent analysis are conducted on hydrogen sulfide, and finally the fluorescent nanometer probe can be applied to detection and analysis of hydrogen sulfide in an actual biological sample.When used for detecting hydrogen sulfide, the fluorescent nanometer probe is excellent in sensitivity and stability, the minimum detection limit reaches 91 pM, and the fluorescent nanometer probe can be used for detecting hydrogen sulfide in the actual sample.

abso: 本申请涉及一种多芯光纤谐振腔气体传感器，包括多芯光纤、光学谐振装置、第一导光结构和第二导光结构。所述多芯光纤包括第一光纤芯和第二光纤芯并具有一端面，所述第一光纤芯和所述第二光纤芯从所述端面露出。所述光学谐振装置设置于所述端面，并具有一个光输入端和一个光输出端。所述第一导光结构设置于所述端面，并与所述第一光纤芯和所述光输入端连接，用于将所述第一光纤芯的光输入所述光学谐振装置。所述第二导光结构设置于所述端面并与所述第二光纤芯和所述光输出端连接，用于将所述光学谐振装置的光输入耦合输出所述第二光纤芯。

absc: 本申请涉及一种多芯光纤谐振腔气体传感器，包括多芯光纤、光学谐振装置、第一导光结构和第二导光结构。所述多芯光纤包括第一光纤芯和第二光纤芯并具有一端面，所述第一光纤芯和所述第二光纤芯从所述端面露出。所述光学谐振装置设置于所述端面，并具有一个光输入端和一个光输出端。所述第一导光结构设置于所述端面，并与所述第一光纤芯和所述光输入端连接，用于将所述第一光纤芯的光输入所述光学谐振装置。所述第二导光结构设置于所述端面并与所述第二光纤芯和所述光输出端连接，用于将所述光学谐振装置的光输入耦合输出所述第二光纤芯。
abse: This application involves a kind of multi-core optical fiber resonant cavity gas sensors, including multi-core optical fiber, optical resonant assembly, the first light guide structure and the second light guide structure.The multi-core optical fiber includes the first fiber cores and the second fiber cores and has end face, and first fiber cores and second fiber cores are exposed from the end face.The optical resonant assembly is set to the end face, and there are one light input end and a light output ends for tool.First light guide structure is set to the end face, and is connect with first fiber cores and the light input end, for the light of first fiber cores to be inputted the optical resonant assembly.Second light guide structure is set to the end face and is connect with second fiber cores and the light output end, for the light input coupling of the optical resonant assembly to be exported second fiber cores.

abso: 本发明公开一种基于车载扫描系统生成精细立面图的方法。所述方法包括：根据车载扫描系统生成车载激光点云和车载同步照片；根据所述车载激光点云生成虚拟投影面；根据所述虚拟投影面和所述车载激光点云生成正射灰度影像；根据所述虚拟投影面、所述车载激光点云和所述车载同步照片生成正射实景影像；根据所述正射灰度影像和所述正射实景影像进行立面测图。采用本发明的方法自动化生成一种可直接量测的立面灰度影像或实景影像，从而提高立面测量的工作效率。

abse: The present invention discloses a kind of method that fine elevation is generated based on vehicle-mounted scanning system.Methods described includes：Vehicle-mounted laser point cloud and vehicle-mounted synchronous photo are generated according to vehicle-mounted scanning system；Virtual projection face is generated according to the vehicle-mounted laser point cloud；Grayscale image is just penetrated according to the virtual projection face and the generation of vehicle-mounted laser point cloud；Live-action image is just penetrated according to the virtual projection face, vehicle-mounted laser point cloud and the vehicle-mounted synchronous photo generation；According to it is described just penetrating grayscale image and it is described just penetrating live-action image carry out facade mapping.A kind of facade grayscale image or live-action image that can directly measure is generated using the method automation of the present invention, so as to improve the operating efficiency of facade measurement.

abso: 本发明公开了一种含有氟、氮、碳元素的氧还原催化剂及其制备方法，以三聚氰胺为氮源，以甲醛为交联剂，建设性的引入了六氟双酚A作为碳源和氟源，通过简单的溶剂热的方法一步合成一种具有兼具氟、氮、碳元素氧还原催化材料。本发明首次使用六氟双酚A作为氟源和碳源，材料在溶剂热合成之后通过热解过程形成一种介孔材料，提高了催化剂与氧化反应液的接触面积，能够有效的提高催化效率，进一步提高了氧还原催化性能。本发明使用的三聚氰胺、甲醛、六氟双酚A和无水乙醇等原材料来源丰富、廉价易得，能够有效的降低Pt/C等燃料电池阴极反应催化剂成本高、价格昂贵、资源稀缺等缺点。
tie: It is a kind of to contain fluorine, nitrogen, the oxygen reduction catalyst of carbon and preparation method thereof

abse: Contain fluorine, nitrogen, the oxygen reduction catalyst of carbon and preparation method thereof the invention discloses a kind of, using melamine as nitrogen source, using formaldehyde as crosslinking agent, the constructive hexafluoro bisphenol-a that introduces has by method one-step synthesis one kind of simple solvent heat as carbon source and Fluorine source and has both fluorine, nitrogen, carbon hydrogen reduction catalysis material.The present invention uses hexafluoro bisphenol-a as Fluorine source and carbon source for the first time, material forms a kind of mesoporous material by pyrolytic process after solvent-thermal process, the contact area of catalyst and oxidation liquid is improved, catalytic efficiency can be effectively improved, further improve hydrogen reduction catalytic performance.The disadvantages of raw material sources such as melamine, formaldehyde, hexafluoro bisphenol-a and dehydrated alcohol that the present invention uses are abundant, cheap and easy to get, can effectively reduce the fuel battery negative poles catalysts such as Pt/C at high cost, expensive, scarcity of resources.

abso: 本发明公开了一种二维激光扫描仪标定方法、系统及装置。所述方法包括：获取标靶反射片的中心点在全站仪坐标系下的坐标；获取扫描仪在小车移动时多个标靶反射片表面的点云数据，并将点云数据的坐标转换到基准坐标系下；获取点云数据中反射强度大于预设阈值的点的坐标，并依据反射强度大于预设阈值的点云数据与邻居点云数据的距离，形成点集聚类；获取点集聚类的重心坐标，点集聚类的重心坐标为标靶反射片中心在初始扫描仪坐标系下的坐标；获取扫描仪坐标系与全站仪坐标系的转换参数；获取车体坐标系与全站仪坐标系的转换参数；获取车体坐标系与扫描仪坐标系的转换参数。本发明不仅能够提高标定精度，还能达到实时、快速的效果。
tie: Two-dimensional laser scanner calibration method, system and device
absc: 本发明公开了一种二维激光扫描仪标定方法、系统及装置。所述方法包括：获取标靶反射片的中心点在全站仪坐标系下的坐标；获取扫描仪在小车移动时多个标靶反射片表面的点云数据，并将点云数据的坐标转换到基准坐标系下；获取点云数据中反射强度大于预设阈值的点的坐标，并依据反射强度大于预设阈值的点云数据与邻居点云数据的距离，形成点集聚类；获取点集聚类的重心坐标，点集聚类的重心坐标为标靶反射片中心在初始扫描仪坐标系下的坐标；获取扫描仪坐标系与全站仪坐标系的转换参数；获取车体坐标系与全站仪坐标系的转换参数；获取车体坐标系与扫描仪坐标系的转换参数。本发明不仅能够提高标定精度，还能达到实时、快速的效果。
abse: The invention discloses a two-dimensional laser scanner calibration method, a system and a device. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring coordinates of a central point of a target reflector plate under a total station coordinate system; acquiring point cloud data of the surfaces of a plurality of target reflectors when the scanner moves by the trolley, and converting the coordinates of the point cloud data into a reference coordinate system; acquiring coordinates of points with reflection intensity larger than a preset threshold value in the point cloud data, and forming point set clustering according to the distance between the point cloud data with reflection intensity larger than the preset threshold value and neighbor point cloud data; acquiring a barycentric coordinate of a point set cluster, wherein the barycentric coordinate of the point set cluster is a coordinate of the center of a target reflector plate under an initial scanner coordinate system; acquiring conversion parameters of a scanner coordinate system and a total station coordinate system; acquiring conversion parameters of a vehicle body coordinate system and a total station coordinate system; and acquiring conversion parameters of the vehicle body coordinate system and the scanner coordinate system. The invention can not only improve the calibration precision, but also achieve the effect of real-time and quick.

abso: 本发明公开了分布式ipv6路由查找方法和系统，该方法包括：构建前缀长度为32位和前缀长度为48位的多分支Trie树；将所有前缀长度除了32位与48位的路由项以前缀长度划分，并建立哈希表；当添加路由项时，判定添加路由项的前缀长度是否为32或48，若是，则将添加路由项添加到多分支Trie树中的对应位置，若不是，则添加到哈希表中；当转发报文时，根据报文分别在多分支Trie树和哈希表中匹配结果转发报文。本发明具有如下优点：将前缀长度为32位和48位的路由占的总数较大，使用多分支Trie树极大的提高了查找速度；其它前缀长度的路由长度分布广、总数较少，用基于前缀长度的算法实现查找，能极大地提高查找速度。
tie: Distributed ipv6 method for searching route and system
absc: 本发明公开了分布式ipv6路由查找方法和系统，该方法包括：构建前缀长度为32位和前缀长度为48位的多分支Trie树；将所有前缀长度除了32位与48位的路由项以前缀长度划分，并建立哈希表；当添加路由项时，判定添加路由项的前缀长度是否为32或48，若是，则将添加路由项添加到多分支Trie树中的对应位置，若不是，则添加到哈希表中；当转发报文时，根据报文分别在多分支Trie树和哈希表中匹配结果转发报文。本发明具有如下优点：将前缀长度为32位和48位的路由占的总数较大，使用多分支Trie树极大的提高了查找速度；其它前缀长度的路由长度分布广、总数较少，用基于前缀长度的算法实现查找，能极大地提高查找速度。
abse: The invention discloses distributed ipv6 method for searching route and systems, this method comprises: the Multi-branch Trie Tree that building prefix length is 32 and prefix length is 48；All prefix lengths are divided in addition to 32 with 48 route entries with prefix length, and establish Hash table；When adding route entry, determine whether the prefix length of addition route entry is 32 or 48, if so, addition route entry is added to the corresponding position in Multi-branch Trie Tree, if it is not, being then added in Hash table；When E-Packeting, according to message, matching result E-Packets in Multi-branch Trie Tree and Hash table respectively.The present invention has the advantage that the sum that the routing that prefix length is 32 and 48 is accounted for is larger, search speed is greatly improved using Multi-branch Trie Tree；The routing distribution of lengths of other prefix lengths is wide, sum is less, is realized and is searched with the algorithm based on prefix length, can greatly improve search speed.

abso: 一种动态可重构高速串行总线中错误控制方法，该方法基于多体双口存储方式N-Memory和多通道并行CRC算法，根据数据链路层的读写请求，将N-Memory中的数据在读写过程中实时进行多通道并行CRC校验。
tie: Method for controlling faults in dynamically reconfigurable high-speed serial bus
absc: 一种动态可重构高速串行总线中错误控制方法，该方法基于多体双口存储方式N-Memory和多通道并行CRC算法，根据数据链路层的读写请求，将N-Memory中的数据在读写过程中实时进行多通道并行CRC校验。
abse: Provided is a method for controlling faults in a dynamically reconfigurable high-speed serial bus. The method is based on an N-Memory of a multi-body double-port memory method and a multi-channel parallel cyclic redundancy check (CRC) algorithm. According to read requirements of a data link layer, multi-channel parallel CRC verification is performed on data in the N-Memory in real time during read.

abso: 一种嵌入式微处理器高速缓存的混合纠错装置，其特征在于：包括EDAC标记编码器、BCH标记编码器、标记存储器、EDAC标记译码器、BCH标记译码器、EDAC数据编码器、BCH数据编码器、数据存储器、EDAC数据译码器、BCH数据译码器、命中判决器和数据选择器，采用EDAC和二进制BCH混合编码方法对Cache标记存储器和数据存储器中的多位数据错误进行纠错，并能够对1位数据错误进行快速纠错。
tie: Mixed error correcting device and method for embedded microprocessor cache
absc: 一种嵌入式微处理器高速缓存的混合纠错装置，其特征在于：包括EDAC标记编码器、BCH标记编码器、标记存储器、EDAC标记译码器、BCH标记译码器、EDAC数据编码器、BCH数据编码器、数据存储器、EDAC数据译码器、BCH数据译码器、命中判决器和数据选择器，采用EDAC和二进制BCH混合编码方法对Cache标记存储器和数据存储器中的多位数据错误进行纠错，并能够对1位数据错误进行快速纠错。
abse: A mixed error correcting device for an embedded microprocessor cache is characterized by comprising an EDAC tag encoder, a BCH tag encoder, a tag memory, an EDAC tag decoder, a BCH tag decoder, an EDAC data encoder, a BCH data encoder, a data memory, an EDAC data decoder, a BCH data decoder, a hit decision device, and a data selector. Multi-bit error in the Cache tag memory and the data memory is corrected by an EDAC and binary BCH mixed encoding method, and a one-bit data error can be corrected quickly.

abso: 本发明公开了一种植物启动子及其应用。本发明首先的CNUSMXY172启动子，为如下序列表中序列1所示的DNA分子。本发明提供的启动子可以驱动外源基因在植物中组成型表达。本发明还保护一种DNA分子，包括目的基因和位于目的基因上游启动其表达的CNUSMXY172启动子。本发明还保护一种制备转基因植物的方法，包括如下步骤：将所述DNA分子导入出发植物，得到组成型表达所述目的基因的转基因植物。本发明有助于促进人们对拟南芥发育生长的研究，且为植物的遗传改造提供了一条经济、快速、有效的途径。本发明在农业领域具有广阔的应用空间和市场前景。
tie: A kind of plant promoter and its application
absc: 本发明公开了一种植物启动子及其应用。本发明首先的CNUSMXY172启动子，为如下序列表中序列1所示的DNA分子。本发明提供的启动子可以驱动外源基因在植物中组成型表达。本发明还保护一种DNA分子，包括目的基因和位于目的基因上游启动其表达的CNUSMXY172启动子。本发明还保护一种制备转基因植物的方法，包括如下步骤：将所述DNA分子导入出发植物，得到组成型表达所述目的基因的转基因植物。本发明有助于促进人们对拟南芥发育生长的研究，且为植物的遗传改造提供了一条经济、快速、有效的途径。本发明在农业领域具有广阔的应用空间和市场前景。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of plant promoter and its application.The CNUSMXY172 promoters of the present invention first, it is the DNA molecular in following sequence table shown in sequence 1.Promoter provided by the invention can drive foreign gene constitutive expression in plant.The present invention also protects a kind of DNA molecular, including target gene and the CNUSMXY172 promoters for starting its expression positioned at target gene upstream.The present invention also protects a kind of method of prepare transgenosis plant, comprises the following steps：The DNA molecular is imported into the plant that sets out, obtains the genetically modified plants of target gene described in constitutive expression.The present invention helps lend some impetus to research of the people to arabidopsis development growth, and provides an economy, fast and effectively approach for the genetic modification of plant.The present invention has wide application space and market prospects in agriculture field.

abso: 本实用新型涉及一种低寄生感光灵敏度全局曝光图像传感器，该传感器包括衬底及生长在衬底上的存储节点；所述衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域生长保护区；存储节点和保护区均为n+型半导体，保护区接高电位。本实用新型在衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域制作保护区，当漏光照射存储节点产生寄生光生电荷时，靠近保护区的p‑n结产生的寄生光生电荷会被连接高电位的n+型半导体保护区收集，减少了进入存储节点的寄生光生电荷，从而避免了信号失真，提高了图像传感器的感光灵敏度。

abso: 本发明涉及掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂及其制备方法和用途。本发明的掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂是将钛酸酯在三氟乙酸溶液中水解，干燥得到固体干凝胶，然后重新溶于水中，加入掺杂剂，进行水热处理制得。采用本发明的制备方法得到的二氧化钛光催化剂在可见光照射下具有良好的光催化活性且光催化活性高。本发明的制备方法简单，所用设备操作容易。该掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂可直接用于污水处理中有机污染物的光催化降解，也可与聚合物树脂混合作为复合光催化剂使用。
tie: Modified visible-light responsive titania doped photocatalyst and production method and uses thereof
absc: 本发明涉及掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂及其制备方法和用途。本发明的掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂是将钛酸酯在三氟乙酸溶液中水解，干燥得到固体干凝胶，然后重新溶于水中，加入掺杂剂，进行水热处理制得。采用本发明的制备方法得到的二氧化钛光催化剂在可见光照射下具有良好的光催化活性且光催化活性高。本发明的制备方法简单，所用设备操作容易。该掺杂改性的可见光响应二氧化钛光催化剂可直接用于污水处理中有机污染物的光催化降解，也可与聚合物树脂混合作为复合光催化剂使用。
abse: The invention relates to a modified visible-light responsive titania doped photocatalyst and production method and uses thereof. The preparation method comprises the following steps that: titanate is hydrolyzed in a trifluoroacetic acid solution and dried to obtain a solid dry gel, and then the solid dry gel is re-dissolved in water, is added with a dopant, and is subjected to hydrothermal treatment to obtain the modified visible-light responsive titania doped photocatalyst. The titania photocatalyst obtained by the preparation method provided by the invention has good photocatalytic activity under irradiation of visible light and high photocatalytic activity. The preparation method is simple, and the equipment is easy to operate. The modified visible-light responsive titania doped photocatalyst can be directly used for photocatalytic degradation of organic pollutants in sewage treatment, and can be mixed with a polymer resin to be used as a composite photocatalyst.

abso: 一种DC‑DC电源系统故障监测与预测方法，该方法包括如下步骤：(1)结合DC‑DC电源系统的电气特性，基于对DC‑DC电源系统的输出电压的监测和分析，分别给出DC‑DC电源系统出现故障时和将要出现故障时的判定标准；(2)在DC‑DC电源系统启动后，在其输出电压达到平稳状态时开始监测该输出电压，并基于所述判定标准监测故障或预测故障。该方法可以实时判定DC‑DC电源系统发生的故障，并在三个判定时钟周期内给出DC‑DC电源系统故障状态，报警迅速，可在DC‑DC电源系统出现故障时对DC‑DC电源系统本身和其负载起到良好的保护作用。
tie: Fault monitoring and forecasting method of direct current (DC)-direct current (DC) power source system
absc: 一种DC‑DC电源系统故障监测与预测方法，该方法包括如下步骤：(1)结合DC‑DC电源系统的电气特性，基于对DC‑DC电源系统的输出电压的监测和分析，分别给出DC‑DC电源系统出现故障时和将要出现故障时的判定标准；(2)在DC‑DC电源系统启动后，在其输出电压达到平稳状态时开始监测该输出电压，并基于所述判定标准监测故障或预测故障。该方法可以实时判定DC‑DC电源系统发生的故障，并在三个判定时钟周期内给出DC‑DC电源系统故障状态，报警迅速，可在DC‑DC电源系统出现故障时对DC‑DC电源系统本身和其负载起到良好的保护作用。
abse: Disclosed is a fault monitoring and forecasting method of direct current (DC)-direct current (DC) power source system, which includes the following steps: combining with electrical characteristics of a DC-DC power source system, respectively providing criterions for power sources when faults occur and when faults are about to occur based on the monitoring and analysis for output voltage of the DC-DC power source system; and beginning to monitor the output voltage after the DC-DC power source system powers on and when the output voltage achieves a steady state and, and monitoring or forecasting the faults based on the criterions. The method has the advantages of being capable of determining the faults which occur to the DC-DC power source system in real time, providing the DC-DC power source system barrier state in three determining clock cycle, and being rapid in alarming and capable of protecting the DC-DC power source system and the load of the system well when faults occur to the DC-DC power source system.

abso: 本发明公开了一种普通小麦低分子量谷蛋白Glu-B3h基因的分子标记及应用。所述分子标记由序列1所示的单链DNA分子和序列2所示的单链DNA分子组成。实验证明：通过该分子标记能快速筛选出具有Glu-B3h基因的小麦品种，相应的面粉品质也会提高，从而加速含有优质基因的小麦新品种的育成步伐。

abse: The invention discloses a molecular marker and application of a common wheat low-molecular-weight glutelin Glu-B3h gene. The molecular marker is composed of single-chain DNA molecules as shown in sequence 1 and single-chain DNA molecules as shown in sequence 2. Experiments prove that by means of the molecular marker, wheat species with the Glu-B3h gene can be fast screened out, correspondingly, the flour quality will be improved, and therefore the breeding pace of new wheat species containing high-quality genes is accelerated.

abso: 本发明公开了基于上下文推理的天空检测算法，包括天空样本数据集的建立、场景分割算法、超像素特征提取、分类器训练以及上下文推理模型的建立，可基于此训练分类器用于初步检测天空区域；建立了CRF上下文推理模型，利用上下文约束进一步提高检测精度，取得了比现有同类算法更高的检测精度；在检测精度与检测速度两方面取得了很好的折中，可以满足实际需求。
tie: Sky detection algorithm based on context inference

abse: The invention discloses a sky detection algorithm based on context inference. The algorithm comprises establishment of a sky sample data set, a scene segmentation algorithm, extraction of super-pixel features, classifier training and establishment of a context inference model. A training classifier can be used to detect the sky area preliminarily; the CRF context inference model is established, so that the detection precision is further improved via context limitation, and a detection precision higher than a present algorithm is obtained; and a balance is made between the detection precision and the detection speed, and the practical requirements are met.

abse: The invention discloses a chalcone analogue containing 2-methyl-4-oxo-quinazoline-6-base, shown in a general formula (I), wherein the definitions of Ar1 and Ar2 are shown in the description. Besides, the invention further discloses a preparation method and a medical composition of the chalcone analogue containing 2-methyl-4-oxo-quinazoline-6-base. The chalcone analogue containing 2-methyl-4-oxo-quinazoline-6-base, shown in the general formula (I), has an inhibiting effect on cell proliferation of human colonic carcinoma (HCT-116) and human breast cancer (MCF-7), and can be used as an antitumor drug.

abso: 本发明提供了一种数字图像的半色调处理方法和系统，涉及图像处理技术领域，其中，通过对待处理图像的像素点的局部亮度信息、对比度信息和结构信息进行提取，并根据局部亮度信息和对比度信息计算出量化阈值，根据量化阈值和各像素点的量化误差灰度值对待处理图像进行二值化，并对二值化后的像素点进行误差传递，从而得到半色调处理图像，该方法有效的保持了输入图像的亮度和对比度信息，同时节约了对图像处理的时间，提高了图像处理的效率。
tie: Halftone processing method and system for digital image
absc: 本发明提供了一种数字图像的半色调处理方法和系统，涉及图像处理技术领域，其中，通过对待处理图像的像素点的局部亮度信息、对比度信息和结构信息进行提取，并根据局部亮度信息和对比度信息计算出量化阈值，根据量化阈值和各像素点的量化误差灰度值对待处理图像进行二值化，并对二值化后的像素点进行误差传递，从而得到半色调处理图像，该方法有效的保持了输入图像的亮度和对比度信息，同时节约了对图像处理的时间，提高了图像处理的效率。
abse: The invention provides a halftone processing method and system for a digital image and relates to the technical field of image processing. The method comprises the following steps: extracting local brightness information, contrast information and structure information of a pixel point of a to-be-processed image; calculating a quantization threshold value according to the local brightness information and the contrast information; performing binarization treatment on the to-be-processed image according to the quantization threshold value and a quantization error gray value of each pixel point; and performing error transferring on the pixel point after binarization, thereby acquiring a halftone processed image. According to the method, the brightness and contrast information of the input image are effectively maintained, the time of image processing is saved, and the image processing efficiency is increased.

abso: 本发明公开了一种多能谱CT成像方法及成像系统，所述多能谱成像方法包括对被测物体扫描、重建基材料的密度图像最终获取被测物体的电子密度、等效原子序数分布或被测物体对单能X射线的线性衰减系数分布。其中多能谱CT重建方法包括：为待重建基材料的密度图像赋初值；对估计图像进行正投影以获得投影估计值；估计重建图像的误差；利用重建图像误差的估计更新图像；重复上述步骤，直到重建的密度图像收敛。相应的，所述多能谱CT成像系统包括扫描模块、重建模块和统计模块，其中所述重建模块又包括初始化模块、投影模块、校正模块和更新模块。
tie: Multi-energy-spectrum CT imaging method and imaging system
absc: 本发明公开了一种多能谱CT成像方法及成像系统，所述多能谱成像方法包括对被测物体扫描、重建基材料的密度图像最终获取被测物体的电子密度、等效原子序数分布或被测物体对单能X射线的线性衰减系数分布。其中多能谱CT重建方法包括：为待重建基材料的密度图像赋初值；对估计图像进行正投影以获得投影估计值；估计重建图像的误差；利用重建图像误差的估计更新图像；重复上述步骤，直到重建的密度图像收敛。相应的，所述多能谱CT成像系统包括扫描模块、重建模块和统计模块，其中所述重建模块又包括初始化模块、投影模块、校正模块和更新模块。
abse: The invention discloses a multi-energy-spectrum CT imaging method and an imaging system. The multi-energy-spectrum CT imaging method comprises the following steps: scanning the object to be detected, and reconstructing the density image of a basic material so as to finally obtain the electron density and equivalent atomic number distribution of the object to be detected or linear attenuation coefficient distribution of the object under the radiation of mono-energetic X-rays. The multi-energy-spectrum CT reconstruction method comprises the following steps: assigning an initial value for the density image of a basic material to be reconstructed; carrying out orthographic projection on an estimated image so as to obtain a projection estimated value; estimating the error of the reconstructed image; updating the image by utilizing the estimated error of the reconstructed image, and repeating the steps mentioned above until the reconstructed density image is convergent. The multi-energy-spectrum CT imaging system comprises a scanning module, a reconstruction module, and a statistics module, wherein the reconstruction module comprises an initializing module, a projecting module, a correcting module, and an updating module.

abso: 本实用新型涉及一种高速灵活采样图像传感器，该传感器的图像反馈单元接收读取电路输出的图像数据并定位需要次采样或者开窗的行或列像素，把选择数据指令传递给编码逻辑单元；编码逻辑单元根据选择指令进行编码；行选译码器、列选译码器分别对编码逻辑单元输出的行编码信号和列编码信号进行译码，在开窗模式或者次采样模式下，行选译码器根据译码结果控制驱动控制电路，选择相应行像素进行扫描，同时列选译码器控制读取电路选择相应列像素数据进行读取。本实用新型有效数据读取速度高，操控性强，开窗效率高，同时不额外增加传感器体积。

abso: 一种结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量系统，包括定位定姿装置、影像采集装置、具有一旋转中心的电子转台及整合装置，定位定姿装置及影像采集装置安装在电子转台上，且定位定姿装置及影像采集装置的坐标中心与所述电子转台的旋转中心重合，定位定姿装置用于获取电子转台的绝对位置数据，影像采集装置获取一被测目标物的点云数据，整合装置对电子转台的绝对位置数据以及被测目标物的点云数据进行联合解算，以得到所述被测目标物的点云的绝对位置数据并建立所述被测目标物的三维模型。本发明还提供了一种结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量方法，所述结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量系统和方法降低了三维测量的工作量。
tie: Three dimensional rotary-scanning measurement system and method combining positioning attitude determination system
absc: 一种结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量系统，包括定位定姿装置、影像采集装置、具有一旋转中心的电子转台及整合装置，定位定姿装置及影像采集装置安装在电子转台上，且定位定姿装置及影像采集装置的坐标中心与所述电子转台的旋转中心重合，定位定姿装置用于获取电子转台的绝对位置数据，影像采集装置获取一被测目标物的点云数据，整合装置对电子转台的绝对位置数据以及被测目标物的点云数据进行联合解算，以得到所述被测目标物的点云的绝对位置数据并建立所述被测目标物的三维模型。本发明还提供了一种结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量方法，所述结合定位定姿系统的三维旋转扫描测量系统和方法降低了三维测量的工作量。
abse: A three dimensional rotation scanning measurement system, which is combined with a positioning and orientation system, comprises: a positioning and orientation apparatus, an image acquisition apparatus, an electronic turntable possessing a rotation center and a converged device. The positioning and orientation apparatus and the image acquisition apparatus are installed on the electronic turntable. Coordinate centers of the positioning and orientation apparatus and the image acquisition apparatus coincide with the rotation center of the electronic turntable. The positioning and orientation apparatus is used to acquire absolute location data of the electronic turntable. The image acquisition apparatus acquires point cloud data of an object to be tested. The converged device is used to carry out combined resolving to the absolute location data of the electronic turntable and the point cloud data of the object to be tested so as to acquire the absolute location data of the point cloud of the object to be tested and establish a three dimensional model of the object to be tested. The invention also provides a three dimensional rotation scanning measurement method which is combined with the positioning and orientation system. By using the system and the method, workload of the three dimensional measurement can be reduced.

abso: 一种斜模式高光谱影像的去噪与去混叠方法，该方法将高光谱影像视为三阶张量，首先通过倒易晶胞获取影像混叠和噪声较小的频谱覆盖，然后从最小均方误差的角度，交替迭代求解三个方向的滤波器，最终完成图像滤波。本发明较传统的逐波段处理方法，在有效减少影像混叠和噪声的同时，既完整的保存了各波段间的相关信息，又保证了影像处理前后空间、光谱信息的一致性。另外，本发明所提出的方法相较于传统逐波段滤波法以及多维滤波方法，在影像质量复原和光谱信息保持方面具有更好的表现。
tie: A kind of tiltedly denoising of pattern Hyperspectral imaging and anti-aliasing method
absc: 一种斜模式高光谱影像的去噪与去混叠方法，该方法将高光谱影像视为三阶张量，首先通过倒易晶胞获取影像混叠和噪声较小的频谱覆盖，然后从最小均方误差的角度，交替迭代求解三个方向的滤波器，最终完成图像滤波。本发明较传统的逐波段处理方法，在有效减少影像混叠和噪声的同时，既完整的保存了各波段间的相关信息，又保证了影像处理前后空间、光谱信息的一致性。另外，本发明所提出的方法相较于传统逐波段滤波法以及多维滤波方法，在影像质量复原和光谱信息保持方面具有更好的表现。
abse: A kind of tiltedly denoising of pattern Hyperspectral imaging and anti-aliasing method, Hyperspectral imaging is considered as three rank tensors by this method, image aliasing is obtained by reciprocal cell first and the less frequency spectrum of noise covers, then from the angle of least mean-square error, alternating iteration solves the wave filter in three directions, is finally completed image filtering.The present invention is more traditional by wave band processing method, while image aliasing and noise is effectively reduced, had both completely saved the relevant information between each wave band, and in turn ensure that space, the uniformity of spectral information before and after image processing.In addition, method proposed by the invention compared to tradition by wave band filter method and multi-C filtering method, the quality of image restore and spectral information holding in terms of there is preferably performance.

abso: 一种描述湿地植被生态水文响应的三维可视化装置及方法，数据库与输入模块连接接收并存储地物分布数据；纹理编辑模块和生态水文模型控制模块分别与数据库连接接收地物分布数据并存入三维可视化计算模块，生成并输出植被纹理数据；生态水文模型控制模块接收生态水文模型，生成并输出生态水文模型数据；数据库接收植被纹理数据和生态水文模型数据，建立植被纹理和生态水文模型的数据信息；三维可视化计算模块与数据库连接，接收植被纹理和生态水文模型的数据信息并进行栅格计算，生成并输出每个网格结点的植被类型、植被高度以及该群落的植被密度；显示模块与三维可视化计算模块连接，对植被类型、植被高度以及该群落的植被密度进行植被三维可视化。
tie: Three-dimensional visualization device and method for describing wetland vegetation eco-hydrology response
absc: 一种描述湿地植被生态水文响应的三维可视化装置及方法，数据库与输入模块连接接收并存储地物分布数据；纹理编辑模块和生态水文模型控制模块分别与数据库连接接收地物分布数据并存入三维可视化计算模块，生成并输出植被纹理数据；生态水文模型控制模块接收生态水文模型，生成并输出生态水文模型数据；数据库接收植被纹理数据和生态水文模型数据，建立植被纹理和生态水文模型的数据信息；三维可视化计算模块与数据库连接，接收植被纹理和生态水文模型的数据信息并进行栅格计算，生成并输出每个网格结点的植被类型、植被高度以及该群落的植被密度；显示模块与三维可视化计算模块连接，对植被类型、植被高度以及该群落的植被密度进行植被三维可视化。
abse: The invention discloses a three-dimensional visualization device and a three-dimensional visualization method for describing a wetland vegetation eco-hydrology response. The device comprises a database, an input module, a texture editing module, an eco-hydrological model control module, a three-dimensional visualization module and a display module, wherein the database is connected with the input module and receives and stores ground feature distribution data; the texture editing module and the eco-hydrological model control module are respectively connected with the database for receiving and storing the ground feature distribution data into the three-dimensional visualization computing module, and generating and outputting vegetation texture data; the eco-hydrological model control module receives an eco-hydrological model, and generates and outputs eco-hydrological model data; the database receives the vegetation texture data and the eco-hydrological model data, and establishes data information of the vegetation texture and the eco-hydrological model; the three-dimensional visualization computing module is connected with the database, receives the data information of the vegetation texture and the eco-hydrological model, performs grid computing, and generates and outputs a vegetation form, vegetation height and vegetation density of a coenosium of each grid node; and the display module is connected with the three-dimensional visualization computing module, and performs the three-dimensional visualization on the vegetation form, the vegetation height and the vegetation density of the coenosium.

abso: 本发明提供了一类丙氨酸铜配合物及其制备方法和应用，是由丙氨酸与铜离子配位，还可含有其它有机小分子配体。本发明配合物的制备方法，是将丙氨酸与铜盐、碱以及其它小分子有机配体在溶剂中搅拌反应，得到所述配合物。本发明配合物合成原料易得，成本低，产品以晶体形式析出，纯度大，产率高；而且，该配合物在自然状态下能稳定存在，并具有良好的水溶性和脂溶性；另外，本发明配合物对肺癌、胃癌、肝癌、结肠腺、白血病、鼻咽癌等多种癌症细胞均呈现出优良的抑制作用，作用谱广，应用范围广泛。
tie: Alanine copper complex as well as preparation method and application thereof
absc: 本发明提供了一类丙氨酸铜配合物及其制备方法和应用，是由丙氨酸与铜离子配位，还可含有其它有机小分子配体。本发明配合物的制备方法，是将丙氨酸与铜盐、碱以及其它小分子有机配体在溶剂中搅拌反应，得到所述配合物。本发明配合物合成原料易得，成本低，产品以晶体形式析出，纯度大，产率高；而且，该配合物在自然状态下能稳定存在，并具有良好的水溶性和脂溶性；另外，本发明配合物对肺癌、胃癌、肝癌、结肠腺、白血病、鼻咽癌等多种癌症细胞均呈现出优良的抑制作用，作用谱广，应用范围广泛。
abse: The invention provides an alanine copper complex as well as a preparation method and an application thereof. The alanine copper complex has coordination of lactamine and copper ions and can also contain other organic micro-molecular ligands. The preparation method of the alanine copper complex comprises the following steps of: putting lactamine, a cupric salt, alkali and other organic micro-molecular ligands into a solvent, and stirring for reaction to obtain the alanine copper complex. The alanine copper complex is easily available in synthetic raw material and low in cost, and the product is separated out in the form of crystal and is high in purity and yield; the alanine copper complex can stably exist in a natural state and has high water solubility and fat solubility; and moreover, the alanine copper complex has a good function of inhibiting a variety of cancer cells such as cells of lung cancer, stomach cancer, liver cancer, colonic gland, leukemia, nasopharyngeal darcinoma and the like, and is wide in action spectrum and application range.

abso: 本发明涉及一种磷化铟包覆硫化铟的核壳结构半导体纳米片材料及其制备方法，其中采用简单的一步水热法先在导电玻璃基片上合成出纳米片状的硫化铟，然后利用磷化的方法在纳米片状的硫化铟表面形成磷化铟包覆层，所述制备方法简单、新颖、可控性强。合成的磷化铟包覆硫化铟的核壳结构半导体纳米片材料有助于光生载流子分离，增强光电转换效率，可以促进光电分解水的效率，符合最新的清洁能源及其可持续能源方面的研究。
tie: Core shell structure semiconductor nano sheet material of indium phosphide cladding indium sulfide and preparation method thereof
absc: 本发明涉及一种磷化铟包覆硫化铟的核壳结构半导体纳米片材料及其制备方法，其中采用简单的一步水热法先在导电玻璃基片上合成出纳米片状的硫化铟，然后利用磷化的方法在纳米片状的硫化铟表面形成磷化铟包覆层，所述制备方法简单、新颖、可控性强。合成的磷化铟包覆硫化铟的核壳结构半导体纳米片材料有助于光生载流子分离，增强光电转换效率，可以促进光电分解水的效率，符合最新的清洁能源及其可持续能源方面的研究。
abse: The present invention relates to core shell structure semiconductor nano sheet material of a kind of indium phosphide cladding indium sulfide and preparation method thereof, wherein first synthesize the indium sulfide of nano-sheet on electro-conductive glass substrate using simple one step hydro thermal method, then inp cladding layer is formed on the indium sulfide surface of nano-sheet using the method for phosphatization, the preparation method is simple, novel, controllability is strong.The core shell structure semiconductor nano sheet material of the indium phosphide cladding indium sulfide of synthesis contributes to photo-generated carrier to separate, and strengthens photoelectric transformation efficiency, can promote the efficiency of photoelectric decomposition water, meet the research in terms of newest clean energy resource and its sustainable energy.

abso: 一种PCI双冗余CAN总线卡，它包含PCI接口芯片、FPGA芯片、隔离电源芯片、隔离芯片、驱动芯片和DB9接头，它们按序彼此相互连接；所述PCI接口芯片是PCI9030芯片，所述FPGA芯片是X3C400芯片，所述隔离电源芯片是DCP010505芯片，所述隔离芯片是HCPL0611芯片，所述驱动芯片是PCA82C250芯片，所述DB9接头是采用标准DB9孔型接插件。本发明设计的PCI双冗余CAN总线卡，实现了真正的双冗余切换网络，无需软件干涉冗余功能管理，只需简单的读写寄存器即可，冗余管理完全由硬件实现，它填补了硬件冗余管理的空白。
tie: PCI (Peripheral Component Interconnect) dual redundancy CAN (Controller Area Network) bus card
absc: 一种PCI双冗余CAN总线卡，它包含PCI接口芯片、FPGA芯片、隔离电源芯片、隔离芯片、驱动芯片和DB9接头，它们按序彼此相互连接；所述PCI接口芯片是PCI9030芯片，所述FPGA芯片是X3C400芯片，所述隔离电源芯片是DCP010505芯片，所述隔离芯片是HCPL0611芯片，所述驱动芯片是PCA82C250芯片，所述DB9接头是采用标准DB9孔型接插件。本发明设计的PCI双冗余CAN总线卡，实现了真正的双冗余切换网络，无需软件干涉冗余功能管理，只需简单的读写寄存器即可，冗余管理完全由硬件实现，它填补了硬件冗余管理的空白。
abse: A PCI (Peripheral Component Interconnect) dual redundancy CAN (Controller Area Network) bus card comprises a PCI interface chip, an FPGA (Field Programmable Gate Array) chip, an isolated power supply chip, an isolated chip, a driver chip and a DB9 joint that are all connected with each other in sequence. The PCI interface chip is the PCI 9030 chip; the FPGA chip is the X3C400 chip; the isolated power supply chip is the DCP010505 chip; the isolated chip is the HCPL0611 chip; the driver chip is the PCA82C250 chip; and the DB9 joint adopts a standard DB9 hole-pattern connector. The PCI dual redundancy CAN, disclosed by the invention, realizes a genuine dual redundancy switching network; a simple read-write register instead of the software is involved in the redundancy function management; and the redundancy management is completely realized by the hardware, therefore, the blank in the redundancy management by the hardware is filled.

abso: 本发明实施例提供了一种用于机器人分布式控制系统的形式建模方法及装置，方法包括：针对所述机器人分布式控制系统，根据各微体系结构模型xMAS元件的同步等式，对各xMAS元件在逻辑编程语言ACL2中形式化，得到所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS元模型；其中，所述各xMAS元件包括Arbiter及以下至少一项：Fork、Join、Switch、Merge、Queue、Sink、Source、和Function；在ACL2中对所述xMAS元模型中的组合逻辑元件和时序逻辑元件进行预设属性的验证；根据所述xMAS元模型，建立所述机器人分布式控制系统对应的xMAS网络。本发明实施例中，能够针对机器人分布式控制系统，创建对应的xMAS网络，进而可以根据xMAS网络实现对机器人分布式控制系统的全面验证。
tie: A kind of formal modeling method and device for robot distributed control system

abse: A kind of formal modeling method and device for robot distributed control system is the embodiment of the invention provides, method includes：For the robot distributed control system, according to the synchronous equation of each microarchitecture model xMAS elements, each xMAS elements are formalized in logic programming language ACL2, obtain the corresponding xMAS meta-models of the robot distributed control system；Wherein, each xMAS elements include Arbiter and it is following at least one：Fork, Join, Switch, Merge, Queue, Sink, Source and Function；The checking of preset attribute is carried out to the combinational logic element and sequential logical element in the xMAS meta-models in ACL2；According to the xMAS meta-models, the corresponding xMAS networks of the robot distributed control system are set up.In the embodiment of the present invention, robot distributed control system can be directed to, create corresponding xMAS networks, and then can be according to xMAS real-time performances to the comprehensive verification of robot distributed control system.

tie: Molecular marker of common wheat high-molecular-weight glutelin 1By18 gene and application of molecular marker of common wheat high-molecular-weight glutelin 1By18 gene

abse: The invention discloses a molecular marker of a common wheat high-molecular-weight glutelin 1By18 gene and an application of the molecular marker of the common wheat high-molecular-weight glutelin 1By18 gene. The molecular marker consists of DNA molecules shown in SEQ ID No. 1and SEQ ID No. 2 and/or DNA molecules shown in SEQ ID No. 1 and SEQ ID No. 3. Experiments prove that the molecular marker is accurate and reliable, has good repeatability, can be used for screening of 1By18 subunit, provides a simple and accurate detection method for effective identification and selection of high-molecular-weight high-quality glutelin subunit during quality improvement of wheat, and has significance on the quality improvement of wheat.

abso: 本实用新型是一种电动汽车锂电池剩余寿命预测装置,包括锂电池设备、电流传感器、信号预处理器、A/D转换器、DSP处理器、网络通信设备、电流监测记录仪、电流显示屏和锂电池剩余寿命预测设备，所述锂电池设备的上设有电流传感器，所述电流传感器上设有与信号预处理器连接的引线，所述信号预处理器与A/D转换器相连接，所述A/D转换器与DSP处理器相连接，所述DSP处理器与网络通信设备相连；该电动汽车锂电池剩余寿命预测装置可以有效的通过记录锂电池工作状态下的随机变电流情况来预测其剩余使用寿命，监测、识别锂电池的健康状态，解决随机时变电流影响下锂电池剩余寿命预测问题，并且可以有效的防止由于锂电池的性能退化问题而造成的灾难性损失。
tie: A kind of electric automobile lithium battery residual service life prediction device

abse: This utility model is a kind of electric automobile lithium battery residual service life prediction device, including lithium battery equipment, current sensor, signal preprocessor, A/D converter, dsp processor, network communication equipment, current monitoring monitor, electric current display screen and lithium battery predicting residual useful life equipment, described lithium battery equipment be provided with current sensor, described current sensor is provided with the lead-in wire being connected with signal preprocessor, described signal preprocessor is connected with A/D converter, described A/D converter is connected with dsp processor, described dsp processor is connected with network communication equipment；This electric automobile lithium battery residual service life prediction device effectively can predict its remaining life by the random time-dependent current situation under record lithium battery duty, monitoring, the health status of identification lithium battery, solve lithium battery predicting residual useful life problem under the influence of random time-dependent electric current, and can effectively prevent the catastrophic loss caused due to the performance degradation problem of lithium battery.

abso: 本发明公开一种全画幅微单鱼眼相机畸变校正方法，获取全画幅鱼眼相机的畸变参数，根据畸变参数确定无畸变影像的坐标矩阵，将拍摄的影像的矩阵坐标与所述无畸变影像的矩阵坐标相匹配，再进行迭代求差值的过程得到与所述拍摄影像的像素坐标距离最近的所述无畸变影像的像素坐标，得到拍摄的无畸变影像的矩阵坐标的每个像元对应的像素值。采用一次采样，迭代求差值的方法进行操作使得校正变得精确，最大程度的保持了原始影像的信息。
tie: Full-frame mirrorless fisheye camera distortion correction algorithm
absc: 本发明公开一种全画幅微单鱼眼相机畸变校正方法，获取全画幅鱼眼相机的畸变参数，根据畸变参数确定无畸变影像的坐标矩阵，将拍摄的影像的矩阵坐标与所述无畸变影像的矩阵坐标相匹配，再进行迭代求差值的过程得到与所述拍摄影像的像素坐标距离最近的所述无畸变影像的像素坐标，得到拍摄的无畸变影像的矩阵坐标的每个像元对应的像素值。采用一次采样，迭代求差值的方法进行操作使得校正变得精确，最大程度的保持了原始影像的信息。
abse: The invention discloses a full-frame mirrorless fisheye camera distortion correction algorithm. Distortion parameters of a full-frame fisheye camera are acquired; a coordinate matrix of a distortionless image is determined according to the distortion parameters; matrix coordinates of a photographed image and the matrix coordinates of the distortionless image are matched; an iterative difference solving process is then carried out to obtain pixel coordinates, closest to the pixel coordinates of the photographed image, of the distortionless image are obtained; and a pixel value corresponding to each pixel of the pixel coordinates of the photographed distortionless image is obtained. The method of one-time sampling and iterative difference solving is adopted for operation, the correction becomes accurate, and the information of the original image is kept to the maximum degree.

abso: 本发明公开了一种软件缺陷检测方法及装置，属于计算机领域。所述方法包括：基于指定错误类型，从待检测源代码中，获取初检代码集合，所述初检代码集合中包括多个存在潜在缺陷的代码段；对于所述初检代码集合中的每个代码段，对所述代码段进行危险路径筛选，得到所述代码段的指令集，所述指令集中包括危险路径；分别对所述每个代码段的指令集进行路径可行性检测，以对所述待检测源代码进行软件缺陷检测。本发明通过对所获初检代码集合包括的代码段中的路径进行危险路径筛选，并对危险路径进行路径可行性检测，进而在保证软件缺陷检测的准确性的前提下，减小缺陷检测所消耗的时间，提高软件缺陷检测的效率。
tie: Software defect detection method and device
absc: 本发明公开了一种软件缺陷检测方法及装置，属于计算机领域。所述方法包括：基于指定错误类型，从待检测源代码中，获取初检代码集合，所述初检代码集合中包括多个存在潜在缺陷的代码段；对于所述初检代码集合中的每个代码段，对所述代码段进行危险路径筛选，得到所述代码段的指令集，所述指令集中包括危险路径；分别对所述每个代码段的指令集进行路径可行性检测，以对所述待检测源代码进行软件缺陷检测。本发明通过对所获初检代码集合包括的代码段中的路径进行危险路径筛选，并对危险路径进行路径可行性检测，进而在保证软件缺陷检测的准确性的前提下，减小缺陷检测所消耗的时间，提高软件缺陷检测的效率。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of software defect detection method and device, belong to computer realm.The method includes：Based on specified type of error, from source code to be detected, initial survey code collection is obtained, the initial survey code collection includes that multiple there are the code segments of latent defect；For each code segment in the initial survey code collection, dangerous path screening is carried out to the code segment, obtains the instruction set of the code segment, described instruction concentration includes dangerous path；Path viability detection is carried out to the instruction set of each code segment respectively, to carry out software defect detection to the source code to be detected.The present invention carries out dangerous path screening by the path in the code segment that includes to obtained initial survey code collection, and path viability detection is carried out to dangerous path, and then under the premise of ensureing the accuracy of software defect detection, reduce the time that defects detection is consumed, improves the efficiency of software defect detection.

abso: 本发明提供了一种水凝胶的制备方法，所述方法包括将植酸分散液和可溶性金属盐溶液混合，经过常规后处理即可得到水凝胶。本发明的制备方法具有以下优点：反应时间短、制备方法简单和具有一定普适性。制备的水凝胶材料具有以下特点：比表面积大、三维网络结构、生物相容性好。
tie: Novel hydrogel prepared from phytic acid and soluble metal salt and preparing method thereof
absc: 本发明提供了一种水凝胶的制备方法，所述方法包括将植酸分散液和可溶性金属盐溶液混合，经过常规后处理即可得到水凝胶。本发明的制备方法具有以下优点：反应时间短、制备方法简单和具有一定普适性。制备的水凝胶材料具有以下特点：比表面积大、三维网络结构、生物相容性好。
abse: The invention provides a preparing method for hydrogel. The method comprises the steps that phytic acid dispersion liquid and a soluble metal salt solution are mixed and treated conventionally to obtain hydrogel. The preparing method has the following advantages that the reaction time is short, and the preparing method is simple and has certain universality. The prepared hydrogel material has the following advantages that the specific area is large, the three-dimensional net structure is good, and the biocompatibility is good.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于回归模型的快速单幅图像去雾算法及系统，算法包括回归模型的训练过程和雾霾图像的处理过程，训练过程包括：生成无雾图像块作为样本；利用大气模型为样本加雾；提取样本的样本特征值；根据样本特征值使用SVM学习回归模型；处理过程包括：输入雾霾图像，将雾霾图像分割为多个均匀块，并提取雾霾图像的最大通道图像；对均匀块进行图像块特征值提取，以根据SVM学习回归模型估计传输参数，并使用引导滤波优化传输图；对提取到的最大通道图像分别进行最大值滤波以及中值滤波，引导滤波优化大气光；根据滤波优化传输图以及优化大气光进行反变换以得到清晰图像。该算法能够快速，准确的对图像进行去雾处理，有效提高图像处理质量。
tie: Regression model-based fast single-image defogging algorithm and system
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于回归模型的快速单幅图像去雾算法及系统，算法包括回归模型的训练过程和雾霾图像的处理过程，训练过程包括：生成无雾图像块作为样本；利用大气模型为样本加雾；提取样本的样本特征值；根据样本特征值使用SVM学习回归模型；处理过程包括：输入雾霾图像，将雾霾图像分割为多个均匀块，并提取雾霾图像的最大通道图像；对均匀块进行图像块特征值提取，以根据SVM学习回归模型估计传输参数，并使用引导滤波优化传输图；对提取到的最大通道图像分别进行最大值滤波以及中值滤波，引导滤波优化大气光；根据滤波优化传输图以及优化大气光进行反变换以得到清晰图像。该算法能够快速，准确的对图像进行去雾处理，有效提高图像处理质量。
abse: The invention discloses a regression model-based fast single-image defogging algorithm and system. The algorithm includes a training process of a regression model and a processing process of a foggy image. The training process includes the following steps that: a fog-free image block is generated and is adopted as a sample; an atmospheric model is utilized to add fog to the sample; the sample feature value of the sample is extracted; and an SVM learning regression model is utilized according to the sample feature value. The processing process includes the following steps that: a foggy image is inputted, the foggy image is divided into a plurality of uniform blocks, and the maximum channel image of the foggy image is extracted; image block feature extraction is performed on the uniform blocks, and transmission parameters are estimated according to the SVM learning regression model, and guided filtering is adopted to optimize a transmission diagram; maximum value filtering and median filtering are performed on the extracted maximum channel image, guided filtering is adopted to optimize atmospheric light; and inverse transformation is carried out according to the filtering optimized transmission diagram and the optimized atmospheric light, so that a clear image can be obtained. With the algorithm adopted, fog removing processing can be performed on an image fast and accurately, and image processing quality can be effectively improved.

abso: 本发明涉及一种木质纤维素水解产物的原位脱毒乙醇发酵方法，其将Y5和CBS6054分别接种于含有木质纤维素稀酸水解液的发酵培养基中，进行原位脱毒乙醇发酵。该方法能高效代谢木质纤维素稀酸水解产物中的葡萄糖和木糖产乙醇并快速代谢糠醛和5－羟甲基糠醛，乙醇产率为0.44g/g，达到理论值的87.5％，并且不需要进行任何脱毒处理，设备要求简单，操作方便，成本低。
tie: Virus-free in situ and alcohol fermentation method of composite bacteria for lignocellulose hydrolysis product
absc: 本发明涉及一种木质纤维素水解产物的原位脱毒乙醇发酵方法，其将Y5和CBS6054分别接种于含有木质纤维素稀酸水解液的发酵培养基中，进行原位脱毒乙醇发酵。该方法能高效代谢木质纤维素稀酸水解产物中的葡萄糖和木糖产乙醇并快速代谢糠醛和5－羟甲基糠醛，乙醇产率为0.44g/g，达到理论值的87.5％，并且不需要进行任何脱毒处理，设备要求简单，操作方便，成本低。
abse: The present invention relates to an in-situ detoxification ethanol fermentation method of lignocellulose hydrolysate, which respectively inoculates Y5 and CBS6054 into fermentation culture medium containing dilute acid lignocellulose hydrolysate to carry out in-situ detoxification alcoholic fermentation. The method can efficiently metabolize glucose and xylose in the dilute acid lignocellulose hydrolysate to produce ethanol, and rapidly metabolize furfural and 5-hydroxymethylfurfural. The yield of ethanol is 0.44g/g, reaching 87.5 percent of the theoretical value. Moreover, any detoxification processing is not needed, the requirement on equipment is low, the operation is convenient, and the cost is low.

abso: 本发明公开一种基于天然植物组织的Fe‑N/C氧还原反应催化剂的制备方法，是将天然植物组织粉碎后，水热碳化，低温冻干，在惰性气氛下于700～1000℃进行高温焙烧，所得产物与铁源掺杂，再次低温冻干，高温焙烧，通过以上步骤制得铁氮掺杂的多孔碳材料氧还原催化剂。该催化剂在碱性条件下催化氧气还原反应的性能与20％Pt/C催化剂相当，但是成本却低于铂基催化剂，可以广泛应用于燃料电池和金属‑空气电池制造领域。
tie: A kind of preparation method of the Fe-N/C oxygen reduction reaction catalyst based on natural plants tissue
absc: 本发明公开一种基于天然植物组织的Fe‑N/C氧还原反应催化剂的制备方法，是将天然植物组织粉碎后，水热碳化，低温冻干，在惰性气氛下于700～1000℃进行高温焙烧，所得产物与铁源掺杂，再次低温冻干，高温焙烧，通过以上步骤制得铁氮掺杂的多孔碳材料氧还原催化剂。该催化剂在碱性条件下催化氧气还原反应的性能与20％Pt/C催化剂相当，但是成本却低于铂基催化剂，可以广泛应用于燃料电池和金属‑空气电池制造领域。
abse: The present invention discloses a kind of preparation method of Fe-N/C oxygen reduction reaction catalyst based on natural plants tissue, it is after crushing natural plants tissue, hydrothermal carbonization, low temperature freeze-drying, it is adulterated under an inert atmosphere in 700~1000 DEG C of progress high-temperature roastings, products therefrom and source of iron, low temperature is lyophilized again, the porous carbon materials oxygen reduction catalyst of iron N doping is made by above step for high-temperature roasting.The performance of catalytic oxygen reduction reaction is suitable with 20%Pt/C catalyst under alkaline condition for the catalyst, but cost is but lower than platinum based catalyst, can be widely applied to fuel cell and metal-air battery manufacturing field.

abso: 本发明涉及脂溶性地塞米松衍生物的纯化方法，该方法包括：采用200～300目硅胶，进行湿法装柱；将地塞米松衍生物粗品上样，采用比重为0.7900～0.8000之间的第一环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液洗脱，除去杂质；然后采用比重为0.8100～0.8300的第二环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液洗脱，收集地塞米松衍生物斑点的接收液，该接收液经浓缩后，加入丙酮，地塞米松衍生物晶体析出。本发明的方法是环境友好、操作简便、工艺可控性好和成本降低的有效的脂溶性地塞米松衍生物的纯化方法，两种特定比重的环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液配合洗脱，使杂质与地塞米松衍生物充分分离，且洗脱液在减压蒸馏回收后，经比重调配在规定范围后，可以方便地重复使用。
tie: A kind of purification process of fat-soluble dexamethasone derivative
absc: 本发明涉及脂溶性地塞米松衍生物的纯化方法，该方法包括：采用200～300目硅胶，进行湿法装柱；将地塞米松衍生物粗品上样，采用比重为0.7900～0.8000之间的第一环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液洗脱，除去杂质；然后采用比重为0.8100～0.8300的第二环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液洗脱，收集地塞米松衍生物斑点的接收液，该接收液经浓缩后，加入丙酮，地塞米松衍生物晶体析出。本发明的方法是环境友好、操作简便、工艺可控性好和成本降低的有效的脂溶性地塞米松衍生物的纯化方法，两种特定比重的环己烷‑乙酸乙酯混合液配合洗脱，使杂质与地塞米松衍生物充分分离，且洗脱液在减压蒸馏回收后，经比重调配在规定范围后，可以方便地重复使用。
abse: The present invention relates to the purification process of fat-soluble dexamethasone derivative, this method includes：Using 200~300 mesh silica gel, wet method dress post is carried out；By dexamethasone derivative crude product loading, the first cyclohexane ethyl acetate mixed liquor elution between using proportion for 0.7900~0.8000 removes impurity；Then use proportion to be eluted for 0.8100~0.8300 the second cyclohexane ethyl acetate mixed liquor, collect the reception liquid of dexamethasone derivative spot, after the reception liquid is concentrated, add acetone, dexamethasone derivative crystal is separated out.The method of the present invention is the purification process of environment-friendly, easy to operate good and cost reduction the effective fat-soluble dexamethasone derivative of process controllability, the cyclohexane ethyl acetate mixed liquor of two kinds of specific gravities coordinates elution, impurity is set to be sufficiently separated with dexamethasone derivative, and eluent is after vacuum distillation recovery, through proportion allotment after prescribed limit, can easily it reuse.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于对比度和结构相似度的图像增强方法，包括步骤：输入原始单幅雾霾图像；通过迭代的四叉树分割实现对大气光的鲁棒估计；采用基于内容的超像素分割技术将图像分割成局部区域块；构造代价函数，对各个局部区域块的大气传播图进行估计，得到各块最优传输参数；利用大气退化模型进行图像恢复。本发明提供的去雾方法有效提高复原场景图像可见度，具有运算速度快、图像恢复效果较好等优点，适用于实时性要求高的系统。
tie: A kind of image enchancing method based on contrast and structural similarity
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于对比度和结构相似度的图像增强方法，包括步骤：输入原始单幅雾霾图像；通过迭代的四叉树分割实现对大气光的鲁棒估计；采用基于内容的超像素分割技术将图像分割成局部区域块；构造代价函数，对各个局部区域块的大气传播图进行估计，得到各块最优传输参数；利用大气退化模型进行图像恢复。本发明提供的去雾方法有效提高复原场景图像可见度，具有运算速度快、图像恢复效果较好等优点，适用于实时性要求高的系统。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of image enchancing method based on contrast and structural similarity, including step：Input original single width haze image；The Robust Estimation to atmosphere light is realized by the Quadtree Partition of iteration；Regional area block is divided the image into using the super-pixel segmentation technology based on content；Cost function is constructed, the atmospheric propagation figure of each regional area block is estimated, obtains each piece of optimal transmission parameters；Image recovery is carried out using atmospheric degradation model.Defogging method provided by the invention, which effectively improves, restores scene image visibility, has many advantages, such as that arithmetic speed is fast, image recovery effects are preferable, suitable for the high system of requirement of real-time.

abso: 本发明涉及一种机械臂运动学形式化分析方法，包括如下步骤：步骤一，确定机械臂机构的结构参数；步骤二，用高阶逻辑语言建立机械臂机构运动学逻辑模型；步骤三，用逻辑公式描述需要验证的运动学约束或属性；步骤四，将机械臂机构运动学逻辑模型和需要验证的运动学约束或属性组成一个逻辑命题；步骤五，利用逻辑推理引擎证明所述逻辑命题是否成立，成立表明所述模型满足所述的约束或者具备所述的属性，否则，不成立表明所述模型不满足所述的约束或者不具备所述的属性。本发明中的形式化验证根据系统形式规范或属性，使用数学方法证明系统的正确性，对所验证的性质而言是精确和完备的。
tie: Mechanical arm kinematics formal analysis method
absc: 本发明涉及一种机械臂运动学形式化分析方法，包括如下步骤：步骤一，确定机械臂机构的结构参数；步骤二，用高阶逻辑语言建立机械臂机构运动学逻辑模型；步骤三，用逻辑公式描述需要验证的运动学约束或属性；步骤四，将机械臂机构运动学逻辑模型和需要验证的运动学约束或属性组成一个逻辑命题；步骤五，利用逻辑推理引擎证明所述逻辑命题是否成立，成立表明所述模型满足所述的约束或者具备所述的属性，否则，不成立表明所述模型不满足所述的约束或者不具备所述的属性。本发明中的形式化验证根据系统形式规范或属性，使用数学方法证明系统的正确性，对所验证的性质而言是精确和完备的。
abse: The invention relates to a mechanical arm kinematics formal analysis method. The method comprises the steps of 1, determining structural parameters of a mechanical arm mechanism; 2, using high-order logical language for building a mechanical arm kinematics logical model; 3, using a logical formula for describing kinematics constraints or attributes needing to be verified; 4, enabling the mechanical arm mechanism kinematics logical model and the kinematics constraints or attributes needing to be verified to form a logical proposition; 5, utilizing a logical reasoning engine for proving whether the logical proposition is true or not; if the logical proposition is true, it represents that the model meets the kinematics constraints or have the attributes; if not, it represents that the model does not meet the kinematics constraints or does not have the attributes. According to formal verification, on the basis of system formal specifications or attributes, the correctness of the system is verified by using the mathematical method, and the verified attributes are precise and complete.

abso: 本实用新型提供一种兼具正置和垂直两种工作方式的光学显微镜，包括目镜、CCD、金属卤素灯光纤接口、物镜及物镜转盘、镜臂、载物台、聚光镜、调焦机构、内置LED灯、显微镜电源接口、电源开关、底座；所述的底座和镜臂相互垂直；底座外侧设有底座侧翼；所述的镜臂兼具底座功能，外侧设有镜臂侧翼；金属卤素灯光纤接口、显微镜电源接口、电源开关安装在镜臂的侧面；金属卤素灯光纤接口的出光口前方安装有45°放置的反光镜；内置LED灯安装于底座内并且位于底座的下方。本实用新型以底座安放于实验台对应于常规正置显微镜工作模式，而以镜臂安放于实验台对应于垂直载物台工作方式，且两者之间只需通过旋转镜体90°即可切换，操作简单。
tie: Optical microscope with upright and vertical working modes
absc: 本实用新型提供一种兼具正置和垂直两种工作方式的光学显微镜，包括目镜、CCD、金属卤素灯光纤接口、物镜及物镜转盘、镜臂、载物台、聚光镜、调焦机构、内置LED灯、显微镜电源接口、电源开关、底座；所述的底座和镜臂相互垂直；底座外侧设有底座侧翼；所述的镜臂兼具底座功能，外侧设有镜臂侧翼；金属卤素灯光纤接口、显微镜电源接口、电源开关安装在镜臂的侧面；金属卤素灯光纤接口的出光口前方安装有45°放置的反光镜；内置LED灯安装于底座内并且位于底座的下方。本实用新型以底座安放于实验台对应于常规正置显微镜工作模式，而以镜臂安放于实验台对应于垂直载物台工作方式，且两者之间只需通过旋转镜体90°即可切换，操作简单。
abse: The utility model provides an optical microscope with two working modes of upright and vertical, which comprises an ocular lens, a CCD, a metal halogen lamp optical fiber interface, an objective lens turntable, a lens arm, an objective table, a condensing lens, a focusing mechanism, a built-in LED lamp, a microscope power interface, a power switch and a base; the base and the mirror arm are mutually vertical; the outer side of the base is provided with a base side wing; the mirror arm has the function of a base, and a mirror arm side wing is arranged on the outer side of the mirror arm; the metal halogen lamp optical fiber interface, the microscope power interface and the power switch are arranged on the side surface of the microscope arm; a reflector arranged at an angle of 45 degrees is arranged in front of a light outlet of the metal halogen lamp optical fiber interface; the built-in LED lamp is arranged in the base and is positioned below the base. The utility model discloses lay in the laboratory bench with the base and be corresponding to the normal microscope mode of putting, and lay in the laboratory bench with the mirror arm and be corresponding to perpendicular objective table working method, and only need between the two through the rotatory mirror body 90 can switch easy operation.

abso: 本实用新型实施例公开了一种飞行器静电防护和收集利用系统，包括：设置在飞行器机身上的至少一个静电收集装置和静电导出电路，多个静电收集装置以矩阵形式排列在飞行器机身，形成静电收集装置矩阵，静电导出电路与静电收集装置矩阵连接，用于将静电收集装置矩阵收集的电能导出到终端用电设备和/或储能设备。本实用新型通过静电收集装置和静电导出电路对飞行器飞行过程中产生的静电电能加以收集和利用，丰富了静电转化为能源转换的方式的同时，消除了对飞行器造成潜在危害的静电，使得飞行器可以适应更多的飞行环境，增加了飞行的安全性，实现对收集到的电能进行存储和控制，使得飞行器具备全天候、全地形、全工况的能源供给能力。
tie: A kind of aircraft electrostatic protection and Collection utilization system
absc: 本实用新型实施例公开了一种飞行器静电防护和收集利用系统，包括：设置在飞行器机身上的至少一个静电收集装置和静电导出电路，多个静电收集装置以矩阵形式排列在飞行器机身，形成静电收集装置矩阵，静电导出电路与静电收集装置矩阵连接，用于将静电收集装置矩阵收集的电能导出到终端用电设备和/或储能设备。本实用新型通过静电收集装置和静电导出电路对飞行器飞行过程中产生的静电电能加以收集和利用，丰富了静电转化为能源转换的方式的同时，消除了对飞行器造成潜在危害的静电，使得飞行器可以适应更多的飞行环境，增加了飞行的安全性，实现对收集到的电能进行存储和控制，使得飞行器具备全天候、全地形、全工况的能源供给能力。
abse: The utility model embodiment discloses a kind of aircraft electrostatic protection and Collection utilization system, including：At least one electrostatic collection device and electrostatic derived circuit being arranged on aircraft fuselage, multiple electrostatic collection devices are arranged in matrix in aircraft fuselage, form electrostatic collection device matrix, electrostatic derived circuit is connect with electrostatic collection device matrix, and the electric energy for collecting electrostatic collection device matrix exports to terminal electrical equipment and/or energy storage device.The utility model is collected and is utilized to the electrostatic energy generated during aircraft flight by electrostatic collection device and electrostatic derived circuit, while enriching electrostatic and be converted into the mode of energy conversion, eliminate the electrostatic that potential hazard is caused to aircraft, so that aircraft is adapted to more flight environment of vehicle, increase the safety of flight, realization is stored and is controlled to the electric energy being collected into so that flying instrument is for round-the-clock, full landform, the energy resource supply ability of full working scope.

abso: 本发明涉及一种显色剂及其制备方法和应用。所述显色剂由羟基氧化钴纳米片混悬液与3,3',5,5'‑四甲基联苯胺水溶液混合制得；其中所述羟基氧化钴纳米片与所述3,3',5,5'‑四甲基联苯胺的摩尔比为2:1。所述显色剂用于检测抗坏血酸，灵敏度较高，检测限较低。
tie: A kind of color developing agent of ascorbic acid detection and its application

abso: 一种嵌入式微处理器高速缓存的混合纠错装置，其特征在于：包括EDAC标记编码器、BCH标记编码器、标记存储器、EDAC标记译码器、BCH标记译码器、EDAC数据编码器、BCH数据编码器、数据存储器、EDAC数据译码器、BCH数据译码器、命中判决器和数据选择器，采用EDAC和二进制BCH混合编码方法对Cache标记存储器和数据存储器中的多位数据错误进行纠错，并能够对1位数据错误进行快速纠错。
tie: The hybrid error correction apparatus and method of embedded microprocessor cache
absc: 一种嵌入式微处理器高速缓存的混合纠错装置，其特征在于：包括EDAC标记编码器、BCH标记编码器、标记存储器、EDAC标记译码器、BCH标记译码器、EDAC数据编码器、BCH数据编码器、数据存储器、EDAC数据译码器、BCH数据译码器、命中判决器和数据选择器，采用EDAC和二进制BCH混合编码方法对Cache标记存储器和数据存储器中的多位数据错误进行纠错，并能够对1位数据错误进行快速纠错。
abse: A kind of hybrid error correction device of embedded microprocessor cache, it is characterised in that：Including EDAC tag encoders, BCH tag encoders, mark memory, EDAC marks decoder, BCH marks decoder, EDAC data encoders, BCH data encoders, data storage, EDAC data decoders, BCH data decoders, hit decision device and data selector, error correction is carried out to the long numeric data mistake in Cache mark memories and data storage using EDAC and binary system BCH hybrid codings method, and quick error correction can be carried out to 1 error in data.

tie: A kind of waste lithium cell efficient separation recyclable device

abse: The present invention is a kind of waste lithium cell efficient separation recyclable device, including waste lithium cell storage device, transmission device, crushing device, shake screen device, heating device, refrigerating plant, magnetic separating device, pneumatic separation device, liquefying plant, recyclable device, filter device, tapping equipment, infuser device, drying device, separator, smelt separator, the storage device is connect by transmission device with crushing device, the crushing device is connect with vibration screen device, the vibration screen device is connect with heating device, the heating device is connect with refrigerating plant, the refrigerating plant is connect with magnetic separating device, the magnetic separating device is connect with pneumatic separation device；The liquefying plant is connect with recyclable device, and the recyclable device is connect with filter device, and the filter device is connect with tapping equipment；The waste lithium cell efficient separation recyclable device is extracted by the analysis of the ambient temperature signal with lithium battery, is efficiently handled waste lithium cell.

abso: 一种基于硬件监视和微包协议的三模冗余容错计算机系统中的关键数据恢复方法，其特征在于：把需要恢复的关键数据分成大小相等的硬件数据块，再把硬件数据块划分成大小相同的监测包；同时在硬件上针对每个硬件数据块设置监视器，该监视器能监测的监测包数与每个硬件数据块划分的监测包数相等，一旦发现某监测包有更新或修改，则形成对该硬件数据块的数据区域重新传送的依据，重新传送数据时以包为单位进行以减少重新传送的数据量。
tie: Hardware monitoring and micro-packet protocol-based key data restoration method
absc: 一种基于硬件监视和微包协议的三模冗余容错计算机系统中的关键数据恢复方法，其特征在于：把需要恢复的关键数据分成大小相等的硬件数据块，再把硬件数据块划分成大小相同的监测包；同时在硬件上针对每个硬件数据块设置监视器，该监视器能监测的监测包数与每个硬件数据块划分的监测包数相等，一旦发现某监测包有更新或修改，则形成对该硬件数据块的数据区域重新传送的依据，重新传送数据时以包为单位进行以减少重新传送的数据量。
abse: The invention discloses a hardware monitoring and micro-packet protocol-based key data restoration method in a triple modular redundancy fault-tolerant computer system. The method is characterized by comprising the following steps of: dividing to-be-restored key data into hardware data blocks with equal size and dividing each hardware data block into monitoring packets with the same size; meanwhile, setting a monitor on hardware aiming at each hardware data block, wherein the number of the monitoring packets which can be monitored by the monitor is equal to that of the monitoring packets obtained by dividing each hardware data block; forming a basis for retransmitting a data region of the hardware data block once the condition that the monitoring packet is updated or amended is discovered; and retransmitting data with packet as a unit so as to reduce retransmitted data quantity.
tio: 基于硬件监视和微包协议的关键数据恢复方法

abso: 一种面向SPARC V8处理器的自修复双冗余流水线及容错方法，其特征在于：所述自修复双冗余流水线包括流水线A、流水线B、指令缓存(301)、自校验模块、比较逻辑(501)、流水线恢复模块(601)、数据缓存(701)、寄存器堆(801)，所述自修复双冗余流水线采用在两条流水线之间设置比较器对流水线单元进行故障检测，利用自校验模块对级间寄存器进行校验定位出故障流水线，根据比较结果和自校验错误信息对流水线进行恢复的方法，对单粒子效应引发的SEU、SET和MBU故障进行容错。
tie: Towards the selfreparing dual redundant streamline and fault-tolerance approach of SPARC V8 processors
absc: 一种面向SPARC V8处理器的自修复双冗余流水线及容错方法，其特征在于：所述自修复双冗余流水线包括流水线A、流水线B、指令缓存(301)、自校验模块、比较逻辑(501)、流水线恢复模块(601)、数据缓存(701)、寄存器堆(801)，所述自修复双冗余流水线采用在两条流水线之间设置比较器对流水线单元进行故障检测，利用自校验模块对级间寄存器进行校验定位出故障流水线，根据比较结果和自校验错误信息对流水线进行恢复的方法，对单粒子效应引发的SEU、SET和MBU故障进行容错。
abse: A kind of selfreparing dual redundant streamline and fault-tolerance approach towards SPARC V8 processors, it is characterised in that：The selfreparing dual redundant streamline includes assembly line A, streamline B, instruction buffer (301), self checking module, CL Compare Logic (501), streamline recovery module (601), data buffer storage (701), register file (801), the selfreparing dual redundant streamline uses sets comparator to carry out fault detect to pipelined units between two streamlines, verification is carried out to level inter-register using self checking module and orients failure streamline, the method recovered according to comparative result and self checking error message to streamline, the SEU triggered to single particle effect, SET and MBU failures carry out fault-tolerant.

abso: 本发明涉及一种中空硫化物纳米材料的制备方法以及由该方法制备的中空硫化物纳米材料。根据本发明合成的中空硫化物纳米材料的方法具有反应温度低，反应时间短和获得的产物具有好的单分散性的特点。制备的中空的硫化物纳米材料具有大的比表面积、均一的形貌和较多的化学活性位点，另外可以根据反应时间很好的控制球形纳米材料的中空程度。
tie: Preparation method of hollow sulfide nanometer material
absc: 本发明涉及一种中空硫化物纳米材料的制备方法以及由该方法制备的中空硫化物纳米材料。根据本发明合成的中空硫化物纳米材料的方法具有反应温度低，反应时间短和获得的产物具有好的单分散性的特点。制备的中空的硫化物纳米材料具有大的比表面积、均一的形貌和较多的化学活性位点，另外可以根据反应时间很好的控制球形纳米材料的中空程度。
abse: The invention relates to a preparation method of a hollow sulfide nanometer material and the hollow sulfide nanometer material prepared through the method. According to the method of the synthesized hollow sulfide nanometer material, reaction temperature is low, reaction time is short, and the obtained product has the advantage of being good in monodispersion. The prepared hollow sulfide nanometer material has a large specific surface area, uniform morphology and many chemical active sites, and the hollow degree of the spherical nanometer material can be well controlled according to the reaction time.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于有机聚合物薄膜的太赫兹波调制器，包括介质基板和附着于介质基板表面的有机聚合物薄膜，介质基板为具有高阻抗值的硅材料，厚度0.1-2mm，有机聚合物薄膜由聚2-(2-乙基已氧基)-5-甲氧基苯乙炔均匀旋涂在介质基板上形成，薄膜厚度为100-250nm。本发明提供了一种制备简单，造价低廉、调制深度高、稳定可靠的光控太赫兹波调制器。
tie: Terahertz wave modulator based on organic polymer film
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于有机聚合物薄膜的太赫兹波调制器，包括介质基板和附着于介质基板表面的有机聚合物薄膜，介质基板为具有高阻抗值的硅材料，厚度0.1-2mm，有机聚合物薄膜由聚2-(2-乙基已氧基)-5-甲氧基苯乙炔均匀旋涂在介质基板上形成，薄膜厚度为100-250nm。本发明提供了一种制备简单，造价低廉、调制深度高、稳定可靠的光控太赫兹波调制器。
abse: The invention discloses a terahertz wave modulator based on an organic polymer film. The terahertz wave modulator comprises a dielectric substrate and the organic polymer film attached to the surface of the dielectric substrate. The dielectric substrate is made of silicon materials with a high resistance value, the thickness of the dielectric substrate ranges from 0.1 mm to 2 mm, the organic polymer film is formed in the mode that the dielectric substrate is coated with poly2-(2-ethyl oxethyl)-5-ethynylanisole in a spun mode, and the thickness of the organic polymer film ranges from 100 nm to 250 nm. The light-control terahertz wave modulator is easy to manufacture, low in manufacturing cost, high in modulation depth, stable and reliable.

abso: 本发明公开了一种燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料的制备方法，所将金属‑有机框架的孔道封装二元离子液，从而合成燃料电池质子交换膜材料。根据本发明的制备方法可控性强，通过测量气体吸附测量金属有机框架的孔道大小，定量的滴加二元离子液，得到负载理想比例二元离子液的燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料。利用金属有机框架灌装二元离子液制备燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料，成本低、循环性能好，且在无水、中高温表现出优越的导电性能。得到的复合材料安全、对环境无害，符合新材料在清洁能源与环境可持续发展中的应用。
tie: Preparation method of high-temperature proton exchange membrane material and application of material
absc: 本发明公开了一种燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料的制备方法，所将金属‑有机框架的孔道封装二元离子液，从而合成燃料电池质子交换膜材料。根据本发明的制备方法可控性强，通过测量气体吸附测量金属有机框架的孔道大小，定量的滴加二元离子液，得到负载理想比例二元离子液的燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料。利用金属有机框架灌装二元离子液制备燃料电池中高温质子交换膜材料，成本低、循环性能好，且在无水、中高温表现出优越的导电性能。得到的复合材料安全、对环境无害，符合新材料在清洁能源与环境可持续发展中的应用。
abse: The invention discloses a preparation method of a high-temperature proton exchange membrane material and application of the material. Dibasic ionic liquid is packaged in channels of a metal-organic framework, and accordingly the fuel battery proton exchange membrane material is synthesized. The preparation method is high in controllability, the sizes of the channels of the metal-organic framework are measured by measuring gas adsorption, a certain amount of dibasic ionic liquid is dropwise added, and the high-temperature proton exchange membrane material in a fuel battery loading the dibasic ionic liquid in an ideal proportion is obtained. The high-temperature proton exchange membrane material in the fuel battery is prepared by filling the metal-organic framework with the dibasic ionic liquid, cost is low, circulation performance is good, and electric conductivity is excellent under waterless and medium-and-high-temperature conditions. The obtained composite material is safe and harmless to the environment, and meets the novel material application requirement in clean energy and environment sustainable development.

abso: 本实用新型公开一种基于MSP430F149的校园IC卡系统，包括有上位机及下位机，所述上位机与下位机为无线连接，所述下位机的主控芯片为MSP430F149微控制器、并通过SPI总线连接射频模块，所述下位机的主控芯片采用串口通信连接有WIFI模块，所述WIFI模块内置无线网络协议IEEE802.11协议栈以及TCP/IP协议栈，所述射频模块为基于MFRC‑522芯片的RFID射频IC卡感应模块；该基于MSP430F149的校园IC卡系统增加了打印消费回单功能和智能短信报警功能，更好的体现了人性化设计的思想，极大地提高了可靠性和校园卡。

abse: The utility model discloses a kind of Campus Smart Card system based on MSP430F149, include host computer and slave computer, the host computer and slave computer are wireless connection, the main control chip of the slave computer is MSP430F149 microcontrollers and connects radio-frequency module by spi bus, the main control chip of the slave computer is connected with WIFI module using serial communication, wireless network protocol IEEE802.11 protocol stacks built in the WIFI module and ICP/IP protocol stack, the radio-frequency module are the RFID RF IC card induction modules based on the chips of MFRC 522；The Campus Smart Card system based on MSP430F149 adds printing consumption receipt function and intelligent SMS warning function, preferably embodies the thought of human oriented design, drastically increases reliability and campus card.

abso: 本实用新型涉及实验器材技术领域，尤其涉及一种用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置。该用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置包括营养液容器、承托网架以及承托网，所述承托网架包括筒体和外延板，所述筒体包括筒壁和筒底，所述筒壁和筒底分别采用镂空结构，所述外延板环设在所述筒壁的上端外周，所述筒体设置于所述营养液容器内部，所述外延板卡合在所述营养液容器的上端开口处，所述承托网设置于所述筒底上表面。本实用新型所述的用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置，能够保证植物种子能够正好处于气液交界面，为种子发育提供充足的空气与营养液，保证种子的正常生长和培养，而且便于进行种子根系的观察和测量。
tie: A hydroponic device for seed root system growth experiment
absc: 本实用新型涉及实验器材技术领域，尤其涉及一种用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置。该用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置包括营养液容器、承托网架以及承托网，所述承托网架包括筒体和外延板，所述筒体包括筒壁和筒底，所述筒壁和筒底分别采用镂空结构，所述外延板环设在所述筒壁的上端外周，所述筒体设置于所述营养液容器内部，所述外延板卡合在所述营养液容器的上端开口处，所述承托网设置于所述筒底上表面。本实用新型所述的用于种子根系生长实验的水培装置，能够保证植物种子能够正好处于气液交界面，为种子发育提供充足的空气与营养液，保证种子的正常生长和培养，而且便于进行种子根系的观察和测量。
abse: The utility model relates to an experimental device technical field especially relates to a hydroponic device for seed root system growth experiment. This a hydroponic device for seed root system growth experiment includes nutrient solution container, bearing rack and bearing net, the bearing rack includes barrel and epitaxial plate, the barrel includes section of thick bamboo wall and bobbin base, section of thick bamboo wall and bobbin base adopt hollow out construction respectively, the epitaxial plate encircles and establishes the upper end periphery of section of thick bamboo wall, the barrel set up in inside the nutrient solution container, the epitaxial plate block is in the upper end opening part of nutrient solution container, the bearing net set up in bobbin base upper surface. A hydroponic device for seed root system growth experiment, can guarantee that plant seeds can just in time be in gas-liquid interface, for seed development provides sufficient air and nutrient solution, guarantee the normal growth and the cultivation of seed, be convenient for carry out the observation and the measurement of seed root system moreover.

abse: This application discloses the platinum complexes of the Methyl hydrazinecarbodithioate derivative of indole-2-ketone shown in logical formula (I), wherein the definition of each substituent group is detailed in specification.In addition, also disclosing the preparation method of above compound, the Pharmaceutical composition comprising it.The logical formula (I) compound represented is inhibited to the proliferation of human breast carcinoma, human colon cancer cell, can be used as anti-tumor drug or is used to prepare anti-tumor drug as anti-tumor active ingredient.

abso: 本发明涉及一种高速多光谱图像传感器，该传感器包括集成在图像传感器芯片上的Ⅰ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅰ读取通道、Ⅱ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅱ读取通道、Ⅲ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅲ读取通道、……n谱段像素阵列及与之对应的n读取通道，及集成在图像传感器芯片上的信号选通模块；对于任一高优先级谱段像素阵列，其部分行像素通过行选开关连接到本谱段像素阵列对应的读取通道，其余行像素通过信号选通模块分别连接到普通级谱段像素阵列对应的读取通道。本发明中多光谱图像传感器由于具有共享读取通道的优势，可以将像素从其它通道中存储积分，从而提高多光谱图像传感器的扫描速率。对于n谱段图像传感器，数据输出效率可以提高n倍。
tie: High speed multispectral image sensor and data transmission method
absc: 本发明涉及一种高速多光谱图像传感器，该传感器包括集成在图像传感器芯片上的Ⅰ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅰ读取通道、Ⅱ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅱ读取通道、Ⅲ谱段像素阵列及与之对应的Ⅲ读取通道、……n谱段像素阵列及与之对应的n读取通道，及集成在图像传感器芯片上的信号选通模块；对于任一高优先级谱段像素阵列，其部分行像素通过行选开关连接到本谱段像素阵列对应的读取通道，其余行像素通过信号选通模块分别连接到普通级谱段像素阵列对应的读取通道。本发明中多光谱图像传感器由于具有共享读取通道的优势，可以将像素从其它通道中存储积分，从而提高多光谱图像传感器的扫描速率。对于n谱段图像传感器，数据输出效率可以提高n倍。
abse: The invention relates to a high speed multispectral image sensor including a I spectral section pixel array and a corresponding I reading channel, a II spectral section pixel array and a corresponding II reading channel, a III spectral section pixel array and a corresponding III reading channel, ... an n spectral section pixel array and a corresponding n reading channel all integrated on an image sensor chip, and a signal gating module integrated on the image sensor chip. For any spectral section pixel array with high priority, a part of row pixels thereof are connected to the reading channel corresponding to the spectral section pixel array through a row selection switch, and the rest of the row pixels are connected to the reading channels corresponding to the common-level spectral section pixel arrays respectively through the signal gating module. The multispectral image sensor has the advantages of sharing the reading channels, can store and integrate pixels from other channels, and thus improves the scanning speed. For the image sensor with n spectral sections, the data output efficiency can be improved by n times.

abso: 本发明涉及一种可收集寄生光生电荷的图像传感器，该传感器包括衬底及生长在衬底上的存储节点；所述衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域生长保护区；存储节点和保护区均为n+型半导体，保护区接高电位。本发明在衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域制作保护区，当漏光照射存储节点产生寄生光生电荷时，靠近保护区的p‑n结产生的寄生光生电荷会被连接高电位的n+型半导体保护区收集，减少了进入存储节点的寄生光生电荷，从而避免了信号失真，提高了图像传感器的感光灵敏度。
tie: Image sensor capable of collecting parasitic photo-induced charges
absc: 本发明涉及一种可收集寄生光生电荷的图像传感器，该传感器包括衬底及生长在衬底上的存储节点；所述衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域生长保护区；存储节点和保护区均为n+型半导体，保护区接高电位。本发明在衬底上靠近存储节点寄生p‑n结的区域制作保护区，当漏光照射存储节点产生寄生光生电荷时，靠近保护区的p‑n结产生的寄生光生电荷会被连接高电位的n+型半导体保护区收集，减少了进入存储节点的寄生光生电荷，从而避免了信号失真，提高了图像传感器的感光灵敏度。
abse: The invention relates to an image sensor capable of collecting parasitic photo-induced charges, comprising a substrate and a storage node grown on the substrate. Protection regions are grown near the region of a parasitic p-n junction of the storage node on the substrate. Both the storage node and the protection regions are n+ semiconductors, and the protection regions are connected with high potential. According to the invention, as the protection regions are made near the region of the parasitic p-n junction of the storage node on the substrate, when leaked light shines on the storage node to produce parasitic photo-induced charges, parasitic photo-induced charges produced by the p-n junction near the protection regions are collected by the n+ semiconductor protection regions connected with high potential, and the number of parasitic photo-induced charges going into the storage node is reduced. Therefore, signal distortion is avoided, and the sensitivity of the image sensor to light is improved.

abso: 一种航空视频图像的无鬼影横向条带式快速拼接方法，包括正射校正、图像配准、图像拼接等环节。正射校正：使用惯性测量单元(IMU)提供的实时姿态角数据正射校正每帧图像。图像配准：采用相位相关法计算两帧正射图像之间的平移关系。图像拼接：以一帧正射图像为基准，计算每帧正射图像与其之间的平移关系。图像拼接：估算每帧图像应参与拼接的部分条带，并将这些条带融合在一起，形成全局图像。本发明不需要GPS位置数据和高程数据，也不需要检测图像特征点，处理速度快，满足外场快速数据质量检查及应急响应需求。另外，本发明只使用了经过校正后的每帧正射图像中很窄的条带，舍去了造成鬼影的冗余部分，避免了鬼影现象。
tie: No-ghosting lateral stripe fast splicing method of aerial video images
absc: 一种航空视频图像的无鬼影横向条带式快速拼接方法，包括正射校正、图像配准、图像拼接等环节。正射校正：使用惯性测量单元(IMU)提供的实时姿态角数据正射校正每帧图像。图像配准：采用相位相关法计算两帧正射图像之间的平移关系。图像拼接：以一帧正射图像为基准，计算每帧正射图像与其之间的平移关系。图像拼接：估算每帧图像应参与拼接的部分条带，并将这些条带融合在一起，形成全局图像。本发明不需要GPS位置数据和高程数据，也不需要检测图像特征点，处理速度快，满足外场快速数据质量检查及应急响应需求。另外，本发明只使用了经过校正后的每帧正射图像中很窄的条带，舍去了造成鬼影的冗余部分，避免了鬼影现象。
abse: The invention provides a no-ghosting lateral stripe fast splicing method of aerial video images. The method comprises orthorectification, image registration, and image splicing. In the orthorectification, the real-time attitude angle data provided by an inertial measurement unit (IMU) is used to carry out orthorectification of each frame of image. In the image registration, a phase related method is used to calculate the translation relation between two frames of orthographic images. In the image splicing, with one frame of orthographic image as a reference, the translation relationship between each frame of orthographic image and the frame of orthographic image is calculated. In the image splicing, a part of stripes which should participate in splicing of each frame of image is estimated, the stripes are fused together, and a global image is formed. According to the method, GPS position data and elevation data are not needed, the detection of an image characteristic point is not needed, the processing speed is fast, and outfield data quality inspection and emergency response needs are satisfied. In addition, only a narrow stripe in each frame of corrected orthographic image is used, a redundant part which causes ghosting is rejected, and a ghosting phenomenon is avoided.

abso: 本发明提供一种用于表面增强拉曼检测的系统和方法。利用微流控薄片实现了当样品量非常少时的表面增强拉曼检测，而且通过微流控薄片中的三个Y型结构避免了微流控薄片内大量杂质的存在，避免了杂质对表面增强拉曼检测效果的影响。
tie: System and method for surface enhancement Raman detection
absc: 本发明提供一种用于表面增强拉曼检测的系统和方法。利用微流控薄片实现了当样品量非常少时的表面增强拉曼检测，而且通过微流控薄片中的三个Y型结构避免了微流控薄片内大量杂质的存在，避免了杂质对表面增强拉曼检测效果的影响。
abse: The invention provides a system and a method for surface enhancement Raman detection. The surface enhancement Raman detection is realized by utilizing a microfluidic thin sheet when few samples are adopted; moreover, the existence of a great quantity of impurities in the microfluidic thin sheet is prevented by three Y-shaped structures in the microfluidic thin sheet, and the influences of the impurities on the surface enhancement detection effects are prevented.

abso: 本发明提供了一种语句自动排序方法及装置，其中，该方法包括：对文档集进行断句预处理，获得语句合集；对语句合集进行训练获得词向量词典，结合预设的同义词词林对所述词向量进行聚类；基于条件熵算法，结合词向量聚类结果，得到语句合集中语句间的邻近度；采用马尔科夫随机游走模型来实现对语句合集中语句的排序。本发明语义分析方法可实现对文本语句逻辑性的自动评判，提高评判效率、减少评判误差，并且可降低数据稀疏的影响，提高语句排序结果生成的效率。
tie: A kind of sentence auto ordering method and device
absc: 本发明提供了一种语句自动排序方法及装置，其中，该方法包括：对文档集进行断句预处理，获得语句合集；对语句合集进行训练获得词向量词典，结合预设的同义词词林对所述词向量进行聚类；基于条件熵算法，结合词向量聚类结果，得到语句合集中语句间的邻近度；采用马尔科夫随机游走模型来实现对语句合集中语句的排序。本发明语义分析方法可实现对文本语句逻辑性的自动评判，提高评判效率、减少评判误差，并且可降低数据稀疏的影响，提高语句排序结果生成的效率。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of sentence auto ordering method and devices, wherein this method comprises: carrying out punctuate pretreatment to document sets, obtains sentence intersection；Sentence intersection is trained and obtains term vector dictionary, the term vector is clustered in conjunction with preset Chinese thesaurus；Based on conditional entropy algorithm, bluebeard compound vector clusters are as a result, obtain the proximity in sentence intersection between sentence；The sequence to sentence in sentence intersection is realized using Markov random walk model.Semantic analysis of the present invention can realize the auto judge to text sentence logicality, improve and judge efficiency, reduce and judge error, and can reduce the influence of Sparse, improve the efficiency that sentence ranking results generate.
