abso: 本发明公开了一种水溶性中空稀土纳米材料及其制备方法及应用。它包括如下步骤：(1)将稀土化合物水溶液，DNA水溶液，氟化物、磷酸盐或钒酸盐水溶液，有机配体源水溶液，分别与非极性有机溶剂、表面活性剂和助表面活性剂混合，分别得到反相微乳液1、反相微乳液2、反相微乳液3、反相微乳液4；(2)将所述反相微乳液2与反相微乳液1混合，得到混合溶液1；将所述反相微乳液3加入混合溶液1混合，得到混合溶液2；再将所述反相微乳液4加入混合溶液2混合，得到混合溶液3；(3)所述混合溶液3进行反相微乳法反应，即得到水溶性中空稀土纳米材料。本发明制备方法成本低、简便，能得到粒径100nm以下的纳米材料，更广泛的应用于生物体内。
tie: A kind of water solubility hollow rare earth nano material and preparation method and application
absc: 本发明公开了一种水溶性中空稀土纳米材料及其制备方法及应用。它包括如下步骤：(1)将稀土化合物水溶液，DNA水溶液，氟化物、磷酸盐或钒酸盐水溶液，有机配体源水溶液，分别与非极性有机溶剂、表面活性剂和助表面活性剂混合，分别得到反相微乳液1、反相微乳液2、反相微乳液3、反相微乳液4；(2)将所述反相微乳液2与反相微乳液1混合，得到混合溶液1；将所述反相微乳液3加入混合溶液1混合，得到混合溶液2；再将所述反相微乳液4加入混合溶液2混合，得到混合溶液3；(3)所述混合溶液3进行反相微乳法反应，即得到水溶性中空稀土纳米材料。本发明制备方法成本低、简便，能得到粒径100nm以下的纳米材料，更广泛的应用于生物体内。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of water-soluble hollow rare earth nano materials and preparation method and application.It includes the following steps：(1) by rare earth compound aqueous solution, aqueous dna, fluoride, phosphate or vanadic acid saline solution, organic ligand source aqueous solution, it is mixed respectively with non-polar organic solvent, surfactant and cosurfactant, respectively obtains reverse micro emulsion 1, reverse micro emulsion 2, reverse micro emulsion 3, reverse micro emulsion 4；(2) reverse micro emulsion 2 with reverse micro emulsion 1 is mixed, obtains mixed solution 1；The reverse micro emulsion 3 is added in mixed solution 1 to mix, obtains mixed solution 2；The reverse micro emulsion 4 is added in mixed solution 2 again to mix, obtains mixed solution 3；(3) mixed solution 3 carries out reverse microemulsion method reaction to get to water-soluble hollow rare earth nano material.Preparation method of the present invention is at low cost, easy, can obtain the nano material below grain size 100nm, is widely applied in organism.

abso: 本公开涉及一株生产温度敏感型淀粉酶的枯草芽孢杆菌，该枯草芽孢杆菌(Bacillus subtilis)的保藏编号为CGMCC No.13985。本公开还提供了所述枯草芽孢杆菌生产的温度敏感型淀粉酶及生物揭展剂和在书画揭展中的用途。本公开所提供的枯草芽孢杆菌生长速度快、发酵周期短，利用该枯草芽孢杆菌，可以生产温度敏感型淀粉酶，该温度敏感型淀粉酶可以在60℃这样较低的温度下失活，在应用于书画修复的揭展工艺过程时，可以避免对书画的高温损伤，在书画裱糊和文物修复领域具有非常好的应用前景。
tie: Production method and application of bacillus subtilis and temperature-sensitive amylase
absc: 本公开涉及一株生产温度敏感型淀粉酶的枯草芽孢杆菌，该枯草芽孢杆菌(Bacillus subtilis)的保藏编号为CGMCC No.13985。本公开还提供了所述枯草芽孢杆菌生产的温度敏感型淀粉酶及生物揭展剂和在书画揭展中的用途。本公开所提供的枯草芽孢杆菌生长速度快、发酵周期短，利用该枯草芽孢杆菌，可以生产温度敏感型淀粉酶，该温度敏感型淀粉酶可以在60℃这样较低的温度下失活，在应用于书画修复的揭展工艺过程时，可以避免对书画的高温损伤，在书画裱糊和文物修复领域具有非常好的应用前景。
abse: The disclosure relates to a Bacillus subtilis for producing temperature-sensitive amylase, wherein the preservation number of the Bacillus subtilis is CGMCC No. 13985. The disclosure also provides a temperature-sensitive amylase produced by the bacillus subtilis, a biological uncovering agent and application in painting and calligraphy uncovering. The bacillus subtilis provided by the disclosure has the advantages of high growth speed and short fermentation period, and can be used for producing the temperature-sensitive amylase which can be inactivated at a lower temperature of 60 ℃, so that when the bacillus subtilis is applied to a uncovering and unfolding process of painting and calligraphy repairing, the high-temperature damage to the painting and calligraphy can be avoided, and the bacillus subtilis has a good application prospect in the fields of painting and calligraphy pasting and cultural relic repairing.

abso: 本实用新型公开了一种滑轮教具，包括第一杆、第二杆、第一弓形和第二弓形；第二杆的一端与第一杆的中点铰接，第一弓形和第二弓形为分别以第一杆的两个长边为弦的弓形，第一弓形和第二弓形分别与第一杆的两个长边可拆卸连接。使用该滑轮教具时，首先通过绳子和砝码演示第一杆和第二杆的杠杆的原理，然后将两个弓形分别与第一杆的两边连接，使得第一杆和两个弓形构成滑轮，很好的演示了滑轮的杠杆本质。老师在讲解滑轮原理时，不用画图，可以直接使用该教具，生动直接的进行演示，能够很好的演示滑轮的本质，有助于学生的理解和学习。

abse: The utility model discloses a kind of pulley teaching aids, including the first bar, the second bar, the first arch and the second arch；One end of second bar with it is point articulated in the first bar, the first arch and the second arch are that as the arch of string, the first arch and the second arch are detachably connected with two long sides of the first bar two long sides using the first bar respectively respectively.When using the pulley teaching aid, the principle of the lever of the first bar and the second bar is demonstrated by rope and counterweight first, then connect two arch with the both sides of the first bar respectively so that the first bar and two arch constitute pulley, demonstrate the lever essence of pulley well.Teacher does not have to draw, can directly use the teaching aid, vividly directly be demonstrated when explaining pulley principle, can be good at the essence for demonstrating pulley, contributes to the understanding and study of student.

abso: 一种基于红外热波技术的类似于蜂窝结构积水量测量方法，包括如下步骤：（1）以被测试件相同材料制作的标准试件作为参考，以脉冲红外热波技术作为实验方案。（2）降温数据进行归一化后，减去参考孔降温数据获得相对温差数据。（3）相对温差数据乘以对应时刻平方根，获得f曲线。（4）选取不同v<Sub>0</Sub>值，并提取特征时刻t<Sub>0</Sub>。（5）确定能够保持线性上升关系的最大厚度d<Sub>T</Sub>。（6）确定线性最好的为最终v<Sub>0</Sub>值及d<Sub>T</Sub>对应特征时刻作为阈值t<Sub>T</Sub>。（7）t<Sub>0</Sub>>t<Sub>T</Sub>的情况下，其厚度可认为大于d<Sub>T</Sub>。（8）t<Sub>0</Sub><t<Sub>T</Sub>的情况下，建立线性关系d<Sup>2</Sup>=at+b。（9）对待测水厚度的降温曲线进行上述操作，以d<Sup>2</Sup>=at+b得到厚度d。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量双层结构中第二层介质厚度。
tie: Method for measuring thickness of second-layer medium of double-layer structure on basis of infrared thermal wave technology
absc: 一种基于红外热波技术的类似于蜂窝结构积水量测量方法，包括如下步骤：（1）以被测试件相同材料制作的标准试件作为参考，以脉冲红外热波技术作为实验方案。（2）降温数据进行归一化后，减去参考孔降温数据获得相对温差数据。（3）相对温差数据乘以对应时刻平方根，获得f曲线。（4）选取不同v<Sub>0</Sub>值，并提取特征时刻t<Sub>0</Sub>。（5）确定能够保持线性上升关系的最大厚度d<Sub>T</Sub>。（6）确定线性最好的为最终v<Sub>0</Sub>值及d<Sub>T</Sub>对应特征时刻作为阈值t<Sub>T</Sub>。（7）t<Sub>0</Sub>>t<Sub>T</Sub>的情况下，其厚度可认为大于d<Sub>T</Sub>。（8）t<Sub>0</Sub><t<Sub>T</Sub>的情况下，建立线性关系d<Sup>2</Sup>=at+b。（9）对待测水厚度的降温曲线进行上述操作，以d<Sup>2</Sup>=at+b得到厚度d。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量双层结构中第二层介质厚度。
abse: The invention discloses a similar method for measuring water yield of a honeycomb structure on the basis of infrared thermal wave technology. The method includes: (1) a standard sample made of the same material of a tested sample is used as reference, and the pulse infrared thermal wave technology is used as an experimental scheme; (2) normalization is performed on cooling data, cooling data of a reference hole is subtracted to obtain relative temperature difference data; (3) the relative temperature difference data multiply by corresponding time square root to obtain an f curve; (4) different v0 values are selected, and characteristic moments t0 are extracted; (5) maximum thickness dT of a linear rising relation can be kept definitely; (6) the v0 with best linearity is used as the finial v0 value, dT corresponding characteristic moment is used as a threshold tT; (7) when t0 is larger than tT, the thickness is larger than dT; (8) when t0 is less than tT, a linear relation d2=at+b is built; and (9) the operation is performed on a cooling curve of thickness of water to be tested, and the thickness d is obtained through d2=at+b. Through the technical scheme, the thickness of the second-layer medium of the double-layer structure can be measured.

abso: 本发明是一种针对地裂缝地质体的三维建模可视化方法及装置，该方法包括：步骤1：读取输入的多源地质数据文件，反演出地质结构数据，储存于数据存储模块；读取地裂缝控制点文件、地裂缝特征信息文件，并将读取的数据组组织为地裂缝数据储存于数据存储模块；步骤2：对建立的三维地质体模型和三维地裂缝模型进行空间布尔运算，得到三维地裂缝地质体模型；步骤3：利用可视化图形接口根据需求渲染三维地质体模型、三维地裂缝模型和三维地裂缝地质体模型，完成地裂缝地质体的三维可视化表达。本发明能够描述地裂缝模型与地质体模型间的拓扑关系，支持空间拓扑运算。
tie: A kind of the three-dimensional modeling method for visualizing and device of ground fissure geologic body
absc: 本发明是一种针对地裂缝地质体的三维建模可视化方法及装置，该方法包括：步骤1：读取输入的多源地质数据文件，反演出地质结构数据，储存于数据存储模块；读取地裂缝控制点文件、地裂缝特征信息文件，并将读取的数据组组织为地裂缝数据储存于数据存储模块；步骤2：对建立的三维地质体模型和三维地裂缝模型进行空间布尔运算，得到三维地裂缝地质体模型；步骤3：利用可视化图形接口根据需求渲染三维地质体模型、三维地裂缝模型和三维地裂缝地质体模型，完成地裂缝地质体的三维可视化表达。本发明能够描述地裂缝模型与地质体模型间的拓扑关系，支持空间拓扑运算。
abse: The present invention is a kind of three-dimensional modeling method for visualizing for ground fissure geologic body and device, this method include：Step 1：The multi-source geologic data file for reading input, is finally inversed by geologic structure data, is stored in data memory module；Ground fissure control dot file, Characteristics of Ground Fissures message file are read, and the data group of reading is organized as ground fissure data storage in data memory module；Step 2：Three-dimensional geological body Model to foundation and dimensionally fractured model carry out space Boolean calculation, obtain three-dimensional ground fissure model of geological structure body；Step 3：Using visualized graphs interface, renders three-dimensional model of geological structure body, dimensionally fractured model and three-dimensional ground fissure model of geological structure body, the three-dimensional visualization for completing ground fissure geologic body are expressed according to demand.The present invention can describe the topological relation between ground fissure model and model of geological structure body, support space topological operation.

abso: 本发明公开了一种来源于小立碗藓的miRNA及其应用。本发明保护的miRNA名称为ppt-mir-83，是SEQ ID No.1所示的RNA。ppt-mir-83可以切割或降解组蛋白去乙酰化酶的mRNA和S-位点特异性糖蛋白13的mRNA。本发明所提供的miRNA对研究植物调节生长发育等方面具有重要的生物学意义和研究价值，将为植物育种提供宝贵的资源并最终用于实际生产。

abse: The invention discloses miRNA derived from physcomitrella patens and an application of the miRNA. The miRNA disclosed by the invention is named as ppt-mir-83 and is RNA as shown in SEQ ID No.1 The ppt-mir-83 can be used for cutting or degrading mRNA of histone deacetylase and mRNA of S-site specific glycoprotein. The miRNA disclosed by the invention has important biological significance and research value in the aspects of research on plant regulation growth and development and the like, and the miRNA provides valuable resources for plant breeding and is finally applied to practical production.

abse: The invention relates to the technology of medical image aiding, in particular to a processing method of functional magnetic resonance imaging data for checking Chinese functional zones. The method includes the steps of firstly, acquiring blood oxygenation level dependent functional magnetic resonance imaging data and diffusion tensor imaging data of a to-be-checked object; secondly processing blood oxygenation level dependent functional magnetic resonance imaging data in task state; thirdly processing blood oxygenation level dependent functional magnetic resonance imaging data in resting state; and fourthly processing diffusion tensor imaging data.

abso: 本发明公开了一种金属蜂窝钎焊件脉冲红外热波检测方法。本方法特点是采用脉冲红外热波技术检测金属蜂窝钎焊件，以热对比度极大峰值时刻对应热图做进一步处理。对该热图做直方图及均衡化处理，并根据蜂窝芯格结构特点及简化的三维热扩散，计算阈值。求热图水平方向和垂直方向曲线所有极值点，所有极小值点位置赋值为1，表示钎焊区域，极小峰值与相邻极大峰值差值小于阈值则该极小峰值点赋值为0，表示无钎焊区域。根据本发明的方法可更加直观、准确、快捷地得到缺陷识别结果，在一些实施方式中还可实现全部步骤的自动化。
tie: Metal beehive brazing member pulse infrared thermal wave detection method
absc: 本发明公开了一种金属蜂窝钎焊件脉冲红外热波检测方法。本方法特点是采用脉冲红外热波技术检测金属蜂窝钎焊件，以热对比度极大峰值时刻对应热图做进一步处理。对该热图做直方图及均衡化处理，并根据蜂窝芯格结构特点及简化的三维热扩散，计算阈值。求热图水平方向和垂直方向曲线所有极值点，所有极小值点位置赋值为1，表示钎焊区域，极小峰值与相邻极大峰值差值小于阈值则该极小峰值点赋值为0，表示无钎焊区域。根据本发明的方法可更加直观、准确、快捷地得到缺陷识别结果，在一些实施方式中还可实现全部步骤的自动化。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of metal beehive brazing member pulse infrared thermal wave detection methods.This method feature is to detect metal beehive brazing member using pulse infrared thermal wave technology, corresponds to thermal map with the hot contrast maximal peak moment and is further processed.Histogram and equalization processing are done to the thermal map, and according to honeycomb core lattice design feature and the three-dimensional thermal diffusion of simplification, calculates threshold value.Thermal map horizontally and vertically all extreme points of curve are sought, all minimum point positions are assigned a value of 1, represent brazing area, then the minimum peak point is assigned a value of 0 to minimum peak value less than threshold value with adjacent very big peak difference values, indicates no brazing area.According to the method for the present invention can it is more intuitive, accurately and quickly obtain defect recognition as a result, can also be achieved the automation of Overall Steps in some embodiments.

abso: 基于对数一阶微分峰值法的缺陷深度测量方法，包括如下步骤：a、采用与被测试件相同的材料制作标准试件，标准试件的缺陷深度已知；b、获得标准试件表面的热图序列；c、得到标准试件不同缺陷深度下对数温度-对数时间一阶微分曲线，并提取各缺陷深度下对应曲线峰值的时刻t；d、将缺陷深度平方L2与对应的峰值时刻t线性拟合，得到标准试件的时间-缺陷深度平方线性关系；e、对被测试件重复步骤b和c，得到被测试件曲线峰值时刻为t1；f、根据步骤d所获得的线性关系和t1，求出被测试件的缺陷深度L1。或根据公式：由标准试件得到公式中参数n值；对被测件重复步骤b和c，得到一阶微分峰值时间t1，利用公式求出被测试件的缺陷深度L1。
tie: Defect depth measuring method based on logarithm first-order differential peak value method
absc: 基于对数一阶微分峰值法的缺陷深度测量方法，包括如下步骤：a、采用与被测试件相同的材料制作标准试件，标准试件的缺陷深度已知；b、获得标准试件表面的热图序列；c、得到标准试件不同缺陷深度下对数温度-对数时间一阶微分曲线，并提取各缺陷深度下对应曲线峰值的时刻t；d、将缺陷深度平方L2与对应的峰值时刻t线性拟合，得到标准试件的时间-缺陷深度平方线性关系；e、对被测试件重复步骤b和c，得到被测试件曲线峰值时刻为t1；f、根据步骤d所获得的线性关系和t1，求出被测试件的缺陷深度L1。或根据公式：由标准试件得到公式中参数n值；对被测件重复步骤b和c，得到一阶微分峰值时间t1，利用公式求出被测试件的缺陷深度L1。
abse: A defect depth measuring method based on a logarithm first-order differential peak value method includes the following steps: a, adopting the same materials with a test piece to manufacture a standard test piece, wherein the defect depth of the standard test piece is known; b, acquiring a thermal map of the surface of the standard test piece; c, achieving a logarithm temperature-logarithm time first-order differential curve under different defect depths and extracting moments t which correspond with curve peak values under various defect depths; d, enabling squares of the defect depths L2 to be linear fitted with the corresponding peak value moments t so as to achieve a time-the square of the defect depth linear relation of the standard test piece; e, repeating the step b and the step c on the test piece to achieve a curve peak value t1of the test piece; and f, obtaining the defect depth L1 of the test piece according to the linear relation achieved in the step d and the t1; or according to a formula: t=(pi+n-2)L2/pi*alpha, achieving a parameter n in the formula through the standard test piece, repeating the step b and the step c on the test piece to achieve the first-order differential peak value moment t1, and obtaining the defect depth L1 of the test piece with the formula.

abso: 本发明公开了一种金属蜂窝钎焊件脉冲红外热波检测方法。本方法特点是采用脉冲红外热波技术检测金属蜂窝钎焊件，以热对比度极大峰值时刻对应热图做进一步处理。对该热图做直方图及均衡化处理，并根据蜂窝芯格结构特点及简化的三维热扩散，计算阈值。求热图水平方向和垂直方向曲线所有极值点，所有极小值点位置赋值为1，表示钎焊区域，极小峰值与相邻极大峰值差值小于阈值则该极小峰值点赋值为0，表示无钎焊区域。根据本发明的方法可更加直观、准确、快捷地得到缺陷识别结果，在一些实施方式中还可实现全部步骤的自动化。
tie: Pulse infrared thermal wave detection method for metal honeycomb brazed part
absc: 本发明公开了一种金属蜂窝钎焊件脉冲红外热波检测方法。本方法特点是采用脉冲红外热波技术检测金属蜂窝钎焊件，以热对比度极大峰值时刻对应热图做进一步处理。对该热图做直方图及均衡化处理，并根据蜂窝芯格结构特点及简化的三维热扩散，计算阈值。求热图水平方向和垂直方向曲线所有极值点，所有极小值点位置赋值为1，表示钎焊区域，极小峰值与相邻极大峰值差值小于阈值则该极小峰值点赋值为0，表示无钎焊区域。根据本发明的方法可更加直观、准确、快捷地得到缺陷识别结果，在一些实施方式中还可实现全部步骤的自动化。
abse: The invention discloses a pulse infrared thermal wave detection method for a metal honeycomb brazed part. The method is characterized by comprising the following steps: detecting the metal honeycomb brazed part through a pulse infrared thermal wave technology, and performing further treatment through a thermograph corresponding to a moment when a thermal contrast maximum peak appears; performing histogram and balance processing on the thermograph, and calculating a threshold value according to the structural characteristics of honeycomb core grids and simplified three-dimensional thermal diffusion; calculating all extreme points on curves along the horizontal direction and the vertical direction of the thermograph, wherein the positions of all the extreme points are assigned with a value 1 representing brazing regions, and the extreme points on which differential values between minimum peak values and adjacent extreme peak values are smaller than the threshold value are assigned with a value 0 representing non-brazing regions. By adopting the method disclosed by the invention, defect recognition results can be obtained more visually, accurately and conveniently, and automation of all steps can be realized in certain embodiments.

abso: 本发明公开一种考虑缺陷尺寸情况下的物体缺陷深度的测量方法，包括以下步骤：S1：使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热成像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列数据；S2：对所获得的热图序列数据，求取所述热图序列数据的对数温度‑对数时间的二阶微分函数，并提取所述二阶微分函数中对应峰值时刻t<Sub>LPSD</Sub>；S3：对所获得的热图序列数据，利用半高宽算法获得被测物体的缺陷直径D；S4：利用本发明所提供的校正方法，计算被测物体的缺陷深度。本发明在考虑缺陷尺寸的情况下测量缺陷深度，可以有效降低现有测量技术中存在的误差。
tie: Method for measuring object defect depth under condition of considering defect size
absc: 本发明公开一种考虑缺陷尺寸情况下的物体缺陷深度的测量方法，包括以下步骤：S1：使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热成像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列数据；S2：对所获得的热图序列数据，求取所述热图序列数据的对数温度‑对数时间的二阶微分函数，并提取所述二阶微分函数中对应峰值时刻t<Sub>LPSD</Sub>；S3：对所获得的热图序列数据，利用半高宽算法获得被测物体的缺陷直径D；S4：利用本发明所提供的校正方法，计算被测物体的缺陷深度。本发明在考虑缺陷尺寸的情况下测量缺陷深度，可以有效降低现有测量技术中存在的误差。
abse: The invention discloses a method for measuring the defect depth of an object under the condition of considering the defect size, which comprises the following steps: s1: heating a measured object by using pulse heating equipment, and simultaneously obtaining heat map sequence data of the surface of the measured object by using an infrared thermal imaging device; s2: for the obtained heat map sequence data, calculating a second order differential function of logarithmic temperature-logarithmic time of the heat map sequence data, and extracting a corresponding peak time t in the second order differential function<Sub>LPSD</Sub>(ii) a S3: acquiring the defect diameter D of the detected object by utilizing a half-height-width algorithm for the acquired heat map sequence data; s4: the defect depth of the measured object is calculated by utilizing the correction method provided by the invention. The invention measures the depth of the defect under the condition of considering the size of the defect, and can effectively reduce the error in the prior measuring technology.

abse: The present invention disclose it is a kind of consideration flaw size in the case of object depth of defect measuring method, comprise the following steps：S1：Testee is heated using PULSE HEATING equipment, while the thermal map sequence data on testee surface is obtained using infrared thermal imaging device；S2：To the thermal map sequence data obtained, the second-order differential function of the logarithm temperature logarithmic time of the thermal map sequence data is asked for, and extracts in the second-order differential function and corresponds to peak value moment t<Sub>LPSD</Sub>；S3：To the thermal map sequence data obtained, diameter D the defects of halfwidth algorithm acquisition testee is utilized；S4：Using bearing calibration provided by the present invention, the defects of calculating testee depth.The present invention measures depth of defect in the case where considering flaw size, can effectively reduce error present in existing measurement technology.

abso: 本发明公开了一种超分辨率显微CT成像系统，该系统包括X射线源、X射线转换可见光装置、显微成像装置、中继成像装置、科学级相机、多轴载物运动装置和控制装置，X射线源发射出的X射线穿透被测目标，经由X射线转换可见光装置线性转换成二维可见光光场分布，该二维可见光光场分布从X射线转换可见光装置的出射面向后传播，并作为物方投射到显微成像装置，经由显微成像装置第一次显微放大成像，然后投射到中继成像装置，经由中继成像装置第二次中继放大成像；中继成像装置包括位于中继成像装置的平行光路上的亚像素扫描件，亚像素扫描件用于控制中继成像装置的成像面上的整体二维图像在垂轴面内进行亚像素二维平移，以获得一系列像元细分的二维图像。本发明能够突破系统原有成像硬件造成的限制，实现超分辨率成像。
tie: Super-resolution micro CT imaging system
absc: 本发明公开了一种超分辨率显微CT成像系统，该系统包括X射线源、X射线转换可见光装置、显微成像装置、中继成像装置、科学级相机、多轴载物运动装置和控制装置，X射线源发射出的X射线穿透被测目标，经由X射线转换可见光装置线性转换成二维可见光光场分布，该二维可见光光场分布从X射线转换可见光装置的出射面向后传播，并作为物方投射到显微成像装置，经由显微成像装置第一次显微放大成像，然后投射到中继成像装置，经由中继成像装置第二次中继放大成像；中继成像装置包括位于中继成像装置的平行光路上的亚像素扫描件，亚像素扫描件用于控制中继成像装置的成像面上的整体二维图像在垂轴面内进行亚像素二维平移，以获得一系列像元细分的二维图像。本发明能够突破系统原有成像硬件造成的限制，实现超分辨率成像。
abse: The invention discloses a super-resolution micro-CT imaging system, which comprises an X-ray source, an X-ray conversion visible light device, a micro-imaging device, a relay imaging device, a scientific camera, a multi-axis loading motion device and a control device, wherein X-rays emitted by the X-ray source penetrate through a detected target, are linearly converted into two-dimensional visible light field distribution through the X-ray conversion visible light device, are transmitted backwards from an emergent surface of the X-ray conversion visible light device and are projected to the micro-imaging device as an object space, are subjected to primary micro-amplification imaging through the micro-imaging device, then are projected to the relay imaging device, and are subjected to secondary relay amplification imaging through the relay imaging device; the relay imaging device comprises a sub-pixel scanning element positioned on a parallel optical path of the relay imaging device, and the sub-pixel scanning element is used for controlling the whole two-dimensional image on the imaging surface of the relay imaging device to perform sub-pixel two-dimensional translation in a vertical axis plane so as to obtain a series of pixel subdivided two-dimensional images. The invention can break through the limitation caused by the original imaging hardware of the system and realize super-resolution imaging.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于多源监测技术融合的地面沉降集成监测方法，包括：在地面沉降重点监测区域布设水准点和GPS监测点，在地表稳定区域布设CR‑GPS‑水准一体点；并在相同时间序列下，获取GPS数据、地面气象数据、MODIS数据、SAR影像和水准测量数据；联合周边CGPS站和IGS站同步观测数据及地面气象数据解算GPS数据；再联合GPS数据、地面气象数据和MODIS数据解算大气延迟相位信息；从初始差分干涉相位图中提取稳定PS点和PS点形变信息；再利用PS点、GPS点、水准点、一体点对应的形变信息，构建地面沉降垂直形变场，融合水平形变场与垂直形变场构建空间数据场，获得高时空分辨率的地面沉降三维形变场信息。本发明能获得大范围、高精度、高时空分辨率的地表三维形变信息。
tie: A kind of surface subsidence integrated monitor method based on the fusion of multi-source monitoring technology
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于多源监测技术融合的地面沉降集成监测方法，包括：在地面沉降重点监测区域布设水准点和GPS监测点，在地表稳定区域布设CR‑GPS‑水准一体点；并在相同时间序列下，获取GPS数据、地面气象数据、MODIS数据、SAR影像和水准测量数据；联合周边CGPS站和IGS站同步观测数据及地面气象数据解算GPS数据；再联合GPS数据、地面气象数据和MODIS数据解算大气延迟相位信息；从初始差分干涉相位图中提取稳定PS点和PS点形变信息；再利用PS点、GPS点、水准点、一体点对应的形变信息，构建地面沉降垂直形变场，融合水平形变场与垂直形变场构建空间数据场，获得高时空分辨率的地面沉降三维形变场信息。本发明能获得大范围、高精度、高时空分辨率的地表三维形变信息。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of surface subsidence integrated monitor methods based on the fusion of multi-source monitoring technology, comprising: lays bench mark and the monitoring point GPS in surface subsidence emphasis monitoring region, lays CR-GPS- level one point in earth's surface stability region；And under same time sequence, GPS data, ground meteorological data, MODIS data, SAR image and measurement of the level data are obtained；The station joint periphery CGPS and IGS station simultaneous observation data and ground meteorological data resolving GPS data；Combine GPS data, ground meteorological data and MODIS data calculation atmosphere delay phase information again；It is extracted from initial differential interferometric phase image and stablizes PS point and PS point deformation data；It recycles PS point, GPS point, bench mark, one to put corresponding deformation data, constructs surface subsidence vertical deformation field, fusion horizontal deformation field and vertical deformation field construct spatial data field, obtain the surface subsidence three-dimensional shaped variable field information of high-spatial and temporal resolution.The present invention can obtain a wide range of, high-precision, high-spatial and temporal resolution earth's surface three-dimensional deformation information.

abso: 本发明公开一种数字域TDI相机成像质量的调整方法及调整系统，调整方法包括：确定预拍区域；根据预拍曝光时间和预拍增益，确定预拍区域的实际灰度均值；确定TDI成像区域的期望曝光时间与期望增益的乘积；确定TDI成像区域的积分级数和积分时间；确定期望增益及期望曝光时间；根据积分级数、积分时间、期望增益及期望曝光时间确定当前TDI成像区域的图像；判断是否还有下一个预拍区域，如果有则更新预拍曝光时间和预拍增益；否则，根据各TDI成像区域的图像确定TDI相机的拍摄图像。本发明的调整方法和调整系统，可根据实际拍摄环境完成数字域TDI相机成像质量的在轨自适应调整。
tie: The method of adjustment and adjustment system of a kind of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality
absc: 本发明公开一种数字域TDI相机成像质量的调整方法及调整系统，调整方法包括：确定预拍区域；根据预拍曝光时间和预拍增益，确定预拍区域的实际灰度均值；确定TDI成像区域的期望曝光时间与期望增益的乘积；确定TDI成像区域的积分级数和积分时间；确定期望增益及期望曝光时间；根据积分级数、积分时间、期望增益及期望曝光时间确定当前TDI成像区域的图像；判断是否还有下一个预拍区域，如果有则更新预拍曝光时间和预拍增益；否则，根据各TDI成像区域的图像确定TDI相机的拍摄图像。本发明的调整方法和调整系统，可根据实际拍摄环境完成数字域TDI相机成像质量的在轨自适应调整。
abse: The present invention discloses the method for adjustment and adjustment system of a kind of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality, and method of adjustment includes：It is determined that clapping region in advance；Time for exposure and pre- bat gain are clapped according to pre-, it is determined that clapping the actual grey average in region in advance；Determine the product for expecting time for exposure and expected gain of TDI imaging regions；Determine the integration sum of series time of integration of TDI imaging regions；Determine expected gain and expect the time for exposure；The image of current TDI imaging regions is determined according to integration series, the time of integration, expected gain and expectation time for exposure；Judge whether also next pre- bat region, if then updating pre- bat time for exposure and pre- bat gain；Otherwise, the image according to each TDI imaging regions determines the shooting image of TDI cameras.Method of adjustment of the invention and adjustment system, can complete the in-orbit self-adaptative adjustment of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality according to actual photographed environment.

abso: 一种视觉里程计，包括圆盘底座、相机、USB多路接口、处理器、惯性测量器，所述处理器和所述惯性测量器集成在所述圆盘底座的中心，所述惯性测量器与所述处理器相连接，所述USB接口有多个，所述USB接口一端与所述处理器相连接，另一端与所述相机连接，所述相机的数量为四个，所述相机的中心位于所述圆盘底座的圆周上，所述相邻相机之间的夹角为90°，相机与系统中心有一定的距离。本实用新型提供的视觉里程计，综合了全向单目视觉里程计以及立体视觉里程计的优势，既具有视野范围大，能够使特征点长时间保留在视野当中，避免了特征点不足而引起的里程计失效，又可以获得视觉里程计运动轨迹的绝对尺度。
tie: Vision odometer
absc: 一种视觉里程计，包括圆盘底座、相机、USB多路接口、处理器、惯性测量器，所述处理器和所述惯性测量器集成在所述圆盘底座的中心，所述惯性测量器与所述处理器相连接，所述USB接口有多个，所述USB接口一端与所述处理器相连接，另一端与所述相机连接，所述相机的数量为四个，所述相机的中心位于所述圆盘底座的圆周上，所述相邻相机之间的夹角为90°，相机与系统中心有一定的距离。本实用新型提供的视觉里程计，综合了全向单目视觉里程计以及立体视觉里程计的优势，既具有视野范围大，能够使特征点长时间保留在视野当中，避免了特征点不足而引起的里程计失效，又可以获得视觉里程计运动轨迹的绝对尺度。
abse: The utility model provides a vision odometer, includes disc base, camera, USB multichannel interface, treater, inertia caliber, the treater with the integration of inertia caliber is in the center of disc base, the inertia caliber with the treater is connected, the USB interface has a plurality ofly, USB interface one end with the treater is connected, the other end with camera connect, the quantity of camera is four, the central point of camera in on the circumference of disc base, contained angle between the adjacent camera is 90, and the camera has certain distance with system centre. The utility model provides a vision odometer, the advantage of having synthesized single mesh vision odometer of qxcomm technology and three -dimensional vision odometer, it is big both to have had a field range, can make the characteristic points remain for a long time in the middle of the field of vision, and having avoided the characteristic points, not enough and odometer that arouse became invalid, can obtain vision odometer movement track's absolute yardstick again.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于K均值聚类的光场前景分割方法及装置，方法包括：针对待处理的光场图像，提取重聚焦图像、极线平面图像和全清晰图像；采用结构张量方法对极线平面图像进行处理，获取极线平面深度信息；采用离散余弦响应方法对重聚焦图像进行处理，获取重聚焦信息；采用超像素分割技术讲全清晰图像分割的多个区域，针对每一个区域，获取区域颜色特征、区域几何特征、区域对应点特征和区域重聚焦特征；并采用K均值聚类计算区域之间的相似度；基于相似度，采用图割算法标记前景和背景，获取光场图像的前景分割结果。上述方法处理后的前景分割结果比现有技术中的前景分割结果更准确。
tie: Light field foreground segmentation method and device based on K mean cluster
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于K均值聚类的光场前景分割方法及装置，方法包括：针对待处理的光场图像，提取重聚焦图像、极线平面图像和全清晰图像；采用结构张量方法对极线平面图像进行处理，获取极线平面深度信息；采用离散余弦响应方法对重聚焦图像进行处理，获取重聚焦信息；采用超像素分割技术讲全清晰图像分割的多个区域，针对每一个区域，获取区域颜色特征、区域几何特征、区域对应点特征和区域重聚焦特征；并采用K均值聚类计算区域之间的相似度；基于相似度，采用图割算法标记前景和背景，获取光场图像的前景分割结果。上述方法处理后的前景分割结果比现有技术中的前景分割结果更准确。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of light field foreground segmentation method based on K mean cluster and device, method to include：For pending light field image, extraction refocusing image, epipolar plane image and full picture rich in detail；Epipolar plane image is handled using structure tensor method, obtains epipolar plane depth information；Handled using discrete cosine response method counterweight focusedimage, obtain refocusing information；Speak multiple regions of picture rich in detail segmentation complete using super-pixel segmentation technology, for each region, acquisition region color feature, region geometry feature, region correspond to point feature and region refocusing feature；And using the similarity between K mean cluster zoning；Based on similarity, algorithm tag foreground and background is cut using figure, obtains the foreground segmentation result of light field image.Foreground segmentation result after above method processing is more accurate than foreground segmentation result of the prior art.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于多源监测技术融合的地面沉降集成监测方法，包括：在地面沉降重点监测区域布设水准点和GPS监测点，在地表稳定区域布设CR‑GPS‑水准一体点；并在相同时间序列下，获取GPS数据、地面气象数据、MODIS数据、SAR影像和水准测量数据；联合周边CGPS站和IGS站同步观测数据及地面气象数据解算GPS数据；再联合GPS数据、地面气象数据和MODIS数据解算大气延迟相位信息；从初始差分干涉相位图中提取稳定PS点和PS点形变信息；再利用PS点、GPS点、水准点、一体点对应的形变信息，构建地面沉降垂直形变场，融合水平形变场与垂直形变场构建空间数据场，获得高时空分辨率的地面沉降三维形变场信息。本发明能获得大范围、高精度、高时空分辨率的地表三维形变信息。
tie: A kind of surface subsidence integrated monitor method based on the fusion of multi-source monitoring technology
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于多源监测技术融合的地面沉降集成监测方法，包括：在地面沉降重点监测区域布设水准点和GPS监测点，在地表稳定区域布设CR‑GPS‑水准一体点；并在相同时间序列下，获取GPS数据、地面气象数据、MODIS数据、SAR影像和水准测量数据；联合周边CGPS站和IGS站同步观测数据及地面气象数据解算GPS数据；再联合GPS数据、地面气象数据和MODIS数据解算大气延迟相位信息；从初始差分干涉相位图中提取稳定PS点和PS点形变信息；再利用PS点、GPS点、水准点、一体点对应的形变信息，构建地面沉降垂直形变场，融合水平形变场与垂直形变场构建空间数据场，获得高时空分辨率的地面沉降三维形变场信息。本发明能获得大范围、高精度、高时空分辨率的地表三维形变信息。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of surface subsidence integrated monitor method based on the fusion of multi-source monitoring technology, including：Bench mark and GPS monitoring points are laid in surface subsidence emphasis monitored area, CR GPS levels one points are laid in earth's surface stability region；And under same time sequence, obtain gps data, ground meteorological data, MODIS data, SAR images and measurement of the level data；Joint periphery CGPS stands and IGS station simultaneous observation data and ground meteorological data resolving GPS data；Combine gps data, ground meteorological data and MODIS data calculation atmosphere delay phase informations again；Stable PS points and PS point deformation datas are extracted from initial differential interferometric phase image；PS points, GPS point, integrally bench mark, deformation data corresponding to point are recycled, builds surface subsidence vertical deformation field, fusion horizontal deformation field builds spatial data field with vertical deformation field, obtains the surface subsidence three-dimensional shaped variable field information of high-spatial and temporal resolution.The present invention can obtain a wide range of, the earth's surface three-dimensional deformation information of high accuracy, high-spatial and temporal resolution.

abso: 本申请实施例提供了一种连接移动终端的多光谱滤光镜系统，涉及光学探测技术领域。包括：多个滤光片；转轮，所述转轮上具有多个通孔，所述多个滤光片一一对应的设置到所述多个通孔中；电机，所述电机的转动轴连接在所述转轮的轴心处；供电电源，所述供电电源设置在所述转轮内并与所述电机连接，所述供电电源用于为所述电机供电。解决了现有技术中多光谱成像设备需要专业相机来配套而导致用户的使用成本太高的技术问题。
tie: Connect the multi-spectrum filter mirror system of mobile terminal
absc: 本申请实施例提供了一种连接移动终端的多光谱滤光镜系统，涉及光学探测技术领域。包括：多个滤光片；转轮，所述转轮上具有多个通孔，所述多个滤光片一一对应的设置到所述多个通孔中；电机，所述电机的转动轴连接在所述转轮的轴心处；供电电源，所述供电电源设置在所述转轮内并与所述电机连接，所述供电电源用于为所述电机供电。解决了现有技术中多光谱成像设备需要专业相机来配套而导致用户的使用成本太高的技术问题。
abse: The embodiment of the present application provides a kind of multi-spectrum filter mirror system for connecting mobile terminal, is related to optical detector technology field.It include: multiple optical filters；Runner, has multiple through-holes on the runner, and the multiple optical filter is arranged correspondingly into the multiple through-hole；Motor, the rotation axis of the motor are connected at the axle center of the runner；Power supply, the power supply are arranged in the runner and connect with the motor, and the power supply is used to power for the motor.Solves the technical problem that multispectral imaging equipment in the prior art needs mm professional camera special mating and causes the use cost of user too high.

abso: 本发明实施例提供一种遥感成像仿真方法及装置，涉及计算机仿真技术领域，用于对卫星光学传感器的成像结果进行仿真。所述方法包括：获取第一图像；根据下采样参数及光学传感器的成像模式参数在所述第一图像中确定下采样区域；对所述下采样区域中的像素进行下采样处理，得到第二图像；根据所述成像模式参数对所述第二图像进行调整，得到基于所述成像模式参数的遥感成像仿真图像。通过该方法可以简化卫星遥感成像的仿真流程，降低卫星遥感成像仿真的实施成本和实施难度。
tie: Remote sensing imaging simulation method and device
absc: 本发明实施例提供一种遥感成像仿真方法及装置，涉及计算机仿真技术领域，用于对卫星光学传感器的成像结果进行仿真。所述方法包括：获取第一图像；根据下采样参数及光学传感器的成像模式参数在所述第一图像中确定下采样区域；对所述下采样区域中的像素进行下采样处理，得到第二图像；根据所述成像模式参数对所述第二图像进行调整，得到基于所述成像模式参数的遥感成像仿真图像。通过该方法可以简化卫星遥感成像的仿真流程，降低卫星遥感成像仿真的实施成本和实施难度。
abse: The embodiment of the invention provides a remote sensing imaging simulation method and device, relates to the technical field of computer simulation, and is used for simulating an imaging result of a satellite optical sensor. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring a first image; determining a downsampling area in the first image according to downsampling parameters and imaging mode parameters of an optical sensor; carrying out downsampling processing on the pixels in the downsampling area to obtain a second image; and adjusting the second image according to the imaging mode parameters to obtain a remote sensing imaging simulation image based on the imaging mode parameters. The method can simplify the simulation process of satellite remote sensing imaging and reduce the implementation cost and the implementation difficulty of satellite remote sensing imaging simulation.

abso: 本发明涉及红外热波无损检测技术，尤其是在红外热波无损检测过程中提高被测物体表面吸收率和发射率的方法及其装置。方法的特征在于在红外热波无损检测过程中，选用具有较好可见光吸收率和红外发射率的功能薄膜，包裹被测物体，并通过将被测物体表面和薄膜之间空气抽掉的方法使功能膜和被测物体紧密接触。本发明提供的实现上述方法的装置，其特征在于由功能薄膜构成抗反射真空袋，真空袋上带有抽气孔和用于密封的卡扣。本发明能够实现检测过程中对被检测物体完全无污损的同时，还能提高被测物体对可见光的吸收率和红外发射率，从而大大提高红外热波无损检测对表面反射率较高且不可进行喷漆处理的物体的检测效果适用于对易腐蚀或者精密航天、航空器件的红外热波无损检测。
tie: Method and apparatus for improving absorptivity and emissivity in infrared thermal wave non-destructive detection
absc: 本发明涉及红外热波无损检测技术，尤其是在红外热波无损检测过程中提高被测物体表面吸收率和发射率的方法及其装置。方法的特征在于在红外热波无损检测过程中，选用具有较好可见光吸收率和红外发射率的功能薄膜，包裹被测物体，并通过将被测物体表面和薄膜之间空气抽掉的方法使功能膜和被测物体紧密接触。本发明提供的实现上述方法的装置，其特征在于由功能薄膜构成抗反射真空袋，真空袋上带有抽气孔和用于密封的卡扣。本发明能够实现检测过程中对被检测物体完全无污损的同时，还能提高被测物体对可见光的吸收率和红外发射率，从而大大提高红外热波无损检测对表面反射率较高且不可进行喷漆处理的物体的检测效果适用于对易腐蚀或者精密航天、航空器件的红外热波无损检测。
abse: The invention relates to a method and apparatus for improving the surface absorbing ratio and emissive power during the infrared heat wave nondestructive testing course in the field of infrared heat wave nondestructive test. It is characterized in that it chooses the function thin foil with better light absorbing ratio and emissive power to cover or coat the tested object and uses the method of drafting the air between the tested object surface and the thin foil to make them closed contact with each other during the infrared heat wave nondestructive testing course. The invention provides two apparatus to achieve the method by the size of the tested object.

tie: Remotely sensed image emulation mode and device
absc: 本发明实施例提供一种遥感成像仿真方法及装置，涉及计算机仿真技术领域，用于对卫星光学传感器的成像结果进行仿真。所述方法包括：获取第一图像；根据下采样参数及光学传感器的成像模式参数在所述第一图像中确定下采样区域；对所述下采样区域中的像素进行下采样处理，得到第二图像；根据所述成像模式参数对所述第二图像进行调整，得到基于所述成像模式参数的遥感成像仿真图像。通过该方法可以简化卫星遥感成像的仿真流程，降低卫星遥感成像仿真的实施成本和实施难度。
abse: The embodiment of the present invention provides a kind of remotely sensed image emulation mode and device, is related to computer simulation technique field, emulates for the imaging results to satellite optical sensor.The described method includes: obtaining the first image；Down-sampling region is determined in the first image according to down-sampling parameter and the imaging pattern parameter of optical sensor；Down-sampling processing is carried out to the pixel in the down-sampling region, obtains the second image；Second image is adjusted according to the imaging pattern parameter, obtains the remotely sensed image emulating image based on the imaging pattern parameter.It can simplify the simulation flow of satellite remote sensing imaging by this method, reduce the implementation cost and enforcement difficulty of satellite remote sensing imaging simulation.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于多特征融合的热红外遥感影像的海上运动目标检测方法。该方法包括：对热红外影像进行海陆分割获得海域影像；利用先验分割参数对海域影像进行多尺度分割得到对象；提取分割得到的对象的亮度和几何特征；通过将得到的分割对象的亮度和几何特征分别对照训练得到的对应的分类规则对分割对象进行决策树分类，从而实现海上运动目标的检测。本发明利用热红外遥感影像作为数据源，能够弥补可见/近红外多光谱影像夜间失效、SAR影像目视解译困难且处理步骤复杂等现有方法的缺点，有利于对检测结果的检验，进一步提高信息准确性；基于检测得到的海上运动目标提取得到的温度信息，有利于对海上运动目标的状态进行判别。
tie: Method for detecting marine moving target of thermal infrared remote sensing image based on multi-feature fusion
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于多特征融合的热红外遥感影像的海上运动目标检测方法。该方法包括：对热红外影像进行海陆分割获得海域影像；利用先验分割参数对海域影像进行多尺度分割得到对象；提取分割得到的对象的亮度和几何特征；通过将得到的分割对象的亮度和几何特征分别对照训练得到的对应的分类规则对分割对象进行决策树分类，从而实现海上运动目标的检测。本发明利用热红外遥感影像作为数据源，能够弥补可见/近红外多光谱影像夜间失效、SAR影像目视解译困难且处理步骤复杂等现有方法的缺点，有利于对检测结果的检验，进一步提高信息准确性；基于检测得到的海上运动目标提取得到的温度信息，有利于对海上运动目标的状态进行判别。
abse: The invention discloses a method for detecting a marine moving target of a thermal infrared remote sensing image based on multi-feature fusion. The method comprises the following steps of carrying out sea-land segmentation on a thermal infrared image to obtain a sea area image; utilizing a priori segmentation parameter to carry out multi-scale segmentation on the sea area image to obtain an object; extracting brightness and geometrical characteristics of the object obtained by segmentation; and carrying out decision tree classification on a segmentation object through corresponding classification rules which are obtained by respectively carrying out contrast training on the obtained brightness and the geometrical characteristics of the segmentation object in order to realize detection of the marine moving target. The method utilizes the thermal infrared remote sensing image as a data source, so that the defects of failure of a visible/near-infrared multispectral image at night, difficulty in visual interpretation of an SAR image, complicated processing steps and the like in the existing method can be made up to be beneficial to detection of a detection result, so that the accuracy of information is further improved; the obtained temperature information is extracted based on the marine moving target obtained by detection to be beneficial to judgement of state of the marine moving target.

abso: 本实用新型提供了一种高光谱成像系统、高光谱相机及高光谱相机系统，该高光谱成像系统在探测器的像平面上以镀膜的方式设置不同透过波长的滤光片，同一透过波长的滤光片在像平面上由像平面的中心向边缘呈放射的形式排列，成像时，控制模块控制电机带动探测器以其中心为轴对目标物体进行旋转扫描，得到目标物体的多个不同波段的高光谱图像。该系统得到的高光谱图像的中心分辨率高，不存在光谱混叠的现象，光谱覆盖范围广，成像系统的集成度高，缓解了现有的采用色散分光技术进行分光时，得到的高光谱图像存在光谱混叠度高，光谱范围窄，成像系统的紧凑性较低的技术问题。
tie: Hyperspectral imager, EO-1 hyperion camera and EO-1 hyperion camera system
absc: 本实用新型提供了一种高光谱成像系统、高光谱相机及高光谱相机系统，该高光谱成像系统在探测器的像平面上以镀膜的方式设置不同透过波长的滤光片，同一透过波长的滤光片在像平面上由像平面的中心向边缘呈放射的形式排列，成像时，控制模块控制电机带动探测器以其中心为轴对目标物体进行旋转扫描，得到目标物体的多个不同波段的高光谱图像。该系统得到的高光谱图像的中心分辨率高，不存在光谱混叠的现象，光谱覆盖范围广，成像系统的集成度高，缓解了现有的采用色散分光技术进行分光时，得到的高光谱图像存在光谱混叠度高，光谱范围窄，成像系统的紧凑性较低的技术问题。
abse: The utility model provides a kind of Hyperspectral imager, EO-1 hyperion camera and EO-1 hyperion camera system, the Hyperspectral imager is in detector as being arranged the different optical filters through wavelength in a manner of plated film in plane, the same optical filter through wavelength arranges in the form of radiation on as plane from the center as plane to edge, when imaging, control module controls motor and detector is driven to carry out rotary scanning to target object using its center as axis, obtains the high spectrum image of multiple and different wave bands of target object.The center resolution for the high spectrum image that the system obtains is high, the phenomenon that there is no Spectra aliasings, spectral coverage is wide, the integrated level of imaging system is high, alleviate it is existing using dispersion light splitting technology be divided when, obtained high spectrum image is there are Spectra aliasing degree height, and spectral region is narrow, the lower technical problem of the compactedness of imaging system.

abso: 本发明公开一种数字域TDI相机成像质量的调整方法及调整系统，调整方法包括：确定预拍区域；根据预拍曝光时间和预拍增益，确定预拍区域的实际灰度均值；确定TDI成像区域的期望曝光时间与期望增益的乘积；确定TDI成像区域的积分级数和积分时间；确定期望增益及期望曝光时间；根据积分级数、积分时间、期望增益及期望曝光时间确定当前TDI成像区域的图像；判断是否还有下一个预拍区域，如果有则更新预拍曝光时间和预拍增益；否则，根据各TDI成像区域的图像确定TDI相机的拍摄图像。本发明的调整方法和调整系统，可根据实际拍摄环境完成数字域TDI相机成像质量的在轨自适应调整。
tie: A kind of method of adjustment and adjustment system of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality
absc: 本发明公开一种数字域TDI相机成像质量的调整方法及调整系统，调整方法包括：确定预拍区域；根据预拍曝光时间和预拍增益，确定预拍区域的实际灰度均值；确定TDI成像区域的期望曝光时间与期望增益的乘积；确定TDI成像区域的积分级数和积分时间；确定期望增益及期望曝光时间；根据积分级数、积分时间、期望增益及期望曝光时间确定当前TDI成像区域的图像；判断是否还有下一个预拍区域，如果有则更新预拍曝光时间和预拍增益；否则，根据各TDI成像区域的图像确定TDI相机的拍摄图像。本发明的调整方法和调整系统，可根据实际拍摄环境完成数字域TDI相机成像质量的在轨自适应调整。
abse: The present invention discloses a kind of method of adjustment of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality and adjustment system, method of adjustment comprise determining that pre- bat region；Time for exposure and pre- bat gain are clapped according to pre-, determines the pre- actual grey mean value for clapping region；Determine the product of the expectation time for exposure and expected gain of TDI imaging region；Determine the integral sum of series time of integration of TDI imaging region；Determine expected gain and expectation time for exposure；The image of current TDI imaging region is determined according to integral series, the time of integration, expected gain and expectation time for exposure；Judge whether there are also next pre- bat region, if there is then updating pre- bat time for exposure and pre- bat gain；Otherwise, the shooting image of TDI camera is determined according to the image of each TDI imaging region.Method of adjustment and adjustment system of the invention, can complete the in-orbit adaptive adjustment of numeric field TDI camera imaging quality according to actual photographed environment.

abso: 本发明公开一种基于同平台多传感器的运动目标探测方法和系统。单片面阵传感器上相互独立的n个图像传感器组成传感器组，布局为沿卫星飞行方向在同一直线上等间距设置n个传感器。该方法包括多个传感器分别采集图像数据；对每个传感器所采集的图像数据进行星上预处理；从接收到的预处理后的数据获取图像，对来自不同传感器的图像进行运算处理从而识别运动目标。该系统包括依次相连的传感器组、图像数据预处理装置和无线发送装置，与无线发送装置无线连接的无线接收装置、以及与无线接收装置相连的运动目标识别装置。该方法运算效率高，便于下一步在星上实现，可确保运动目标探测的性能和精度。可满足减灾救灾等应急响应对运动目标探测技术的需求。
tie: moving object detection method and system based on multiple sensors on same platform
absc: 本发明公开一种基于同平台多传感器的运动目标探测方法和系统。单片面阵传感器上相互独立的n个图像传感器组成传感器组，布局为沿卫星飞行方向在同一直线上等间距设置n个传感器。该方法包括多个传感器分别采集图像数据；对每个传感器所采集的图像数据进行星上预处理；从接收到的预处理后的数据获取图像，对来自不同传感器的图像进行运算处理从而识别运动目标。该系统包括依次相连的传感器组、图像数据预处理装置和无线发送装置，与无线发送装置无线连接的无线接收装置、以及与无线接收装置相连的运动目标识别装置。该方法运算效率高，便于下一步在星上实现，可确保运动目标探测的性能和精度。可满足减灾救灾等应急响应对运动目标探测技术的需求。
abse: The invention discloses a moving object detection method and system based on multiple sensors on the same platform. The n independent image sensors on the single-chip area array sensor form a sensor group, and the n sensors are arranged on the same straight line at equal intervals along the flight direction of the satellite. The method comprises the steps that a plurality of sensors respectively collect image data; performing on-satellite preprocessing on image data acquired by each sensor; images are acquired from the received preprocessed data, and the images from different sensors are subjected to arithmetic processing to identify the moving object. The system comprises a sensor group, an image data preprocessing device, a wireless transmitting device, a wireless receiving device and a moving object recognition device, wherein the sensor group, the image data preprocessing device and the wireless transmitting device are sequentially connected, the wireless receiving device is wirelessly connected with the wireless transmitting device, and the moving object recognition device is connected with the wireless receiving device. The method has high operation efficiency, is convenient to realize on the satellite in the next step, and can ensure the performance and the precision of the detection of the moving target. The requirements of emergency responses such as disaster reduction and relief on the moving target detection technology can be met.

abso: 本发明公开了一种同平台上不同分辨率的传感器联合动目标检测系统及其检测方法，该系统包括安装在同一个卫星平台上的具有第一分辨率的第一传感器和具有第二分辨率的第二传感器，其中第一分辨率低于第二分辨率。第二传感器垂直朝向地面成像，第一传感器沿着卫星运动方向呈前仰角成像，第一传感器和第二传感器均与中央控制器相连。该方法包括：第一传感器持续捕获地面图像并检测图像中是否存在疑似运动目标，如果存在疑似运动目标则通知中央控制器启动第二传感器；第二传感器收到启动命令并开始捕获地面图像进行运动目标确认。本发明在提高了运动目标捕获概率的同时减小了星上数据存储量。
tie: Combine moving target detecting system and detection method with platform different resolution sensor
absc: 本发明公开了一种同平台上不同分辨率的传感器联合动目标检测系统及其检测方法，该系统包括安装在同一个卫星平台上的具有第一分辨率的第一传感器和具有第二分辨率的第二传感器，其中第一分辨率低于第二分辨率。第二传感器垂直朝向地面成像，第一传感器沿着卫星运动方向呈前仰角成像，第一传感器和第二传感器均与中央控制器相连。该方法包括：第一传感器持续捕获地面图像并检测图像中是否存在疑似运动目标，如果存在疑似运动目标则通知中央控制器启动第二传感器；第二传感器收到启动命令并开始捕获地面图像进行运动目标确认。本发明在提高了运动目标捕获概率的同时减小了星上数据存储量。
abse: Sensor the invention discloses different resolution on a kind of same platform combines moving target detecting system and its detection method, the system includes the first sensor with first resolution on same satellite platform and the second sensor with second resolution, and wherein first resolution is less than second resolution.Second sensor vertically ground imaging, first sensor is imaged along satellite motion direction in the preceding elevation angle, and first sensor and second sensor are connected with central controller.The method includes：First sensor whether there is doubtful moving target in persistently capturing ground image and detection image, then notify that central controller starts second sensor if there is doubtful moving target；Second sensor receives startup order and starts capture ground image carries out moving target confirmation.The present invention reduces memory data output on star while moving target acquisition probability is improve.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于K均值聚类的光场前景分割方法及装置，方法包括：针对待处理的光场图像，提取重聚焦图像、极线平面图像和全清晰图像；采用结构张量方法对极线平面图像进行处理，获取极线平面深度信息；采用离散余弦响应方法对重聚焦图像进行处理，获取重聚焦信息；采用超像素分割技术讲全清晰图像分割的多个区域，针对每一个区域，获取区域颜色特征、区域几何特征、区域对应点特征和区域重聚焦特征；并采用K均值聚类计算区域之间的相似度；基于相似度，采用图割算法标记前景和背景，获取光场图像的前景分割结果。上述方法处理后的前景分割结果比现有技术中的前景分割结果更准确。
tie: Light field foreground segmentation method and device based on K mean cluster
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于K均值聚类的光场前景分割方法及装置，方法包括：针对待处理的光场图像，提取重聚焦图像、极线平面图像和全清晰图像；采用结构张量方法对极线平面图像进行处理，获取极线平面深度信息；采用离散余弦响应方法对重聚焦图像进行处理，获取重聚焦信息；采用超像素分割技术讲全清晰图像分割的多个区域，针对每一个区域，获取区域颜色特征、区域几何特征、区域对应点特征和区域重聚焦特征；并采用K均值聚类计算区域之间的相似度；基于相似度，采用图割算法标记前景和背景，获取光场图像的前景分割结果。上述方法处理后的前景分割结果比现有技术中的前景分割结果更准确。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of light field foreground segmentation method and device based on K mean cluster, method include: to extract refocusing image, epipolar plane image and full clear image for light field image to be processed；Epipolar plane image is handled using structure tensor method, obtains epipolar plane depth information；It is handled using discrete cosine response method counterweight focusedimage, obtains refocusing information；The multiple regions for speaking clear image segmentation complete using super-pixel segmentation technology, for each region, acquisition region color feature, region geometry feature, region correspond to point feature and region refocusing feature；And using the similarity between K mean cluster zoning；Based on similarity, algorithm tag foreground and background is cut using figure, obtains the foreground segmentation result of light field image.Treated that the foreground segmentation result of foreground segmentation result than in the prior art is more acurrate for the above method.

abso: 本发明提供了一种获取亚像素位移序列图像的方法及系统，该方法通过确定倾斜模态成像过程中面阵CMOS传感器倾斜角度和积分级数M，进而确定面阵CMOS传感器沿轨方向的开窗尺寸s；获取目标区域的亚像素位移序列图像和确定亚像素位移序列图像的横纵向位移与理论值的差异值，并判断差异值是否小于设定的误差门限阈值；若是，则确定获取的亚像素位移序列图像可用于超分辨重构，实现在时间延迟积分电荷耦合器件推扫成像中，产生用于超分辨重构的具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像，进而利用具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像通过超分辨重构算法达到在原有载荷量级基础上提升图像分辨率的目的。
tie: A kind of method and system obtaining Displacement sequence image
absc: 本发明提供了一种获取亚像素位移序列图像的方法及系统，该方法通过确定倾斜模态成像过程中面阵CMOS传感器倾斜角度和积分级数M，进而确定面阵CMOS传感器沿轨方向的开窗尺寸s；获取目标区域的亚像素位移序列图像和确定亚像素位移序列图像的横纵向位移与理论值的差异值，并判断差异值是否小于设定的误差门限阈值；若是，则确定获取的亚像素位移序列图像可用于超分辨重构，实现在时间延迟积分电荷耦合器件推扫成像中，产生用于超分辨重构的具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像，进而利用具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像通过超分辨重构算法达到在原有载荷量级基础上提升图像分辨率的目的。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of method and system for obtaining Displacement sequence image, this method is by face battle array cmos sensor tilt angle and integral series M during determining inclination modality, and then determining face battle array cmos sensor is along the window size s in rail direction；It obtains the Displacement sequence image of target area and determines the difference value of the transverse and longitudinal displacement and theoretical value of Displacement sequence image, and judge whether difference value is less than the error threshold threshold value of setting；If, then determine that the Displacement sequence image obtained can be used for super-resolution reconstruct, it realizes in time delay integration charge-coupled device push-scanning image, the sequence image with different Displacements for super-resolution reconstruct is generated, and then achievees the purpose that promote image resolution ratio on the basis of original load magnitude by super-resolution restructing algorithm using the sequence image with different Displacements.

abso: 本发明公开了一种多模式CMOS图像传感器及其控制方法。该传感器包括独立控制区域组、外围控制电路、区段模式设置部件、以及区段模式配置部件。该方法包括将传感器上独立控制区域组划分区段；为所划分的各个区段设置模式；根据所设置的模式为相应的区段配置外围控制电路的控制模式。本发明在推扫模式成像时可高频生成具有固定像元差的有规律的序列图像，通过对所获图像进行像元解混或积分，可有效提高图像的分辨率及信噪比；由于可不选取传感器的某个或某些像元区域作为扫描区域，该设计可以使硬件成像时避开质量有问题的像元，增加了器件的可靠性；可利用该器件多个通道对同一目标极短时间内多次成像的特点，实现光学相机成像的运动目标检测。
tie: A kind of multi-mode cmos image sensor and its control method
absc: 本发明公开了一种多模式CMOS图像传感器及其控制方法。该传感器包括独立控制区域组、外围控制电路、区段模式设置部件、以及区段模式配置部件。该方法包括将传感器上独立控制区域组划分区段；为所划分的各个区段设置模式；根据所设置的模式为相应的区段配置外围控制电路的控制模式。本发明在推扫模式成像时可高频生成具有固定像元差的有规律的序列图像，通过对所获图像进行像元解混或积分，可有效提高图像的分辨率及信噪比；由于可不选取传感器的某个或某些像元区域作为扫描区域，该设计可以使硬件成像时避开质量有问题的像元，增加了器件的可靠性；可利用该器件多个通道对同一目标极短时间内多次成像的特点，实现光学相机成像的运动目标检测。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of multi-mode cmos image sensor and its control methods.The sensor includes separate control area group, peripheral control circuits, range mode set parts and range mode arrangement components.This method includes that separate control area group on sensor is divided section；For each section Setting pattern divided；It is the control model that corresponding section configures peripheral control circuits according to set mode.The present invention when push-broom pattern is imaged can high frequency generate the regular sequence image with fixed pixel difference, it is mixed or integrate by carrying out pixel solution to acquired image, the resolution ratio and signal-to-noise ratio of image can be effectively improved；Due to that can not choose some or certain pixel regions of sensor as scanning area, which avoids quality problematic pixel when hardware can be made to be imaged, increase the reliability of device；The characteristics of using the multiple channels of the device to being repeatedly imaged in same target very short time, realizes the moving object detection of optical camera imaging.

abso: 本发明公开负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法、用途及其在芦苇茎枯病原菌中荧光示踪的应用，负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法包括如下步骤：(1)载体材料的制备：制备介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料作为载体材料；(2)将农药吡唑醚菌酯负载在介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料上，得负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品。制备出的农药吡唑醚菌酯载药体系可以负载和释放吡唑醚菌酯，可用于抑制芦苇茎枯病病原菌，并且可用于载药体系在芦苇茎枯病病原菌中的荧光示踪。
tie: Load the preparation method of pesticide pyraclostrobin sample, purposes and its in reed stem wilt opportunistic pathogen fluorescent tracing application
absc: 本发明公开负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法、用途及其在芦苇茎枯病原菌中荧光示踪的应用，负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法包括如下步骤：(1)载体材料的制备：制备介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料作为载体材料；(2)将农药吡唑醚菌酯负载在介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料上，得负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品。制备出的农药吡唑醚菌酯载药体系可以负载和释放吡唑醚菌酯，可用于抑制芦苇茎枯病病原菌，并且可用于载药体系在芦苇茎枯病病原菌中的荧光示踪。
abse: The present invention disclose the load preparation method of pesticide pyraclostrobin sample, purposes and its in reed stem wilt opportunistic pathogen fluorescent tracing application, the preparation method of load pesticide pyraclostrobin sample includes the following steps: the preparation of (1) carrier material: preparing mesoporous silicon oxide carbon quantum dot material as carrier material；(2) pesticide pyraclostrobin is supported in mesoporous silicon oxide carbon quantum dot material, pesticide pyraclostrobin sample must be loaded.The pesticide pyraclostrobin medicine-carried system prepared can load and discharge pyraclostrobin, can be used for inhibiting reed stem wilt pathogen, and can be used for fluorescent tracing of the medicine-carried system in reed stem wilt pathogen.

abso: 本发明公开一种基于同平台多传感器的运动目标探测方法和系统。单片面阵传感器上相互独立的n个图像传感器组成传感器组，布局为沿卫星飞行方向在同一直线上等间距设置n个传感器。该方法包括多个传感器分别采集图像数据；对每个传感器所采集的图像数据进行星上预处理；从接收到的预处理后的数据获取图像，对来自不同传感器的图像进行运算处理从而识别运动目标。该系统包括依次相连的传感器组、图像数据预处理装置和无线发送装置，与无线发送装置无线连接的无线接收装置、以及与无线接收装置相连的运动目标识别装置。该方法运算效率高，便于下一步在星上实现，可确保运动目标探测的性能和精度。可满足减灾救灾等应急响应对运动目标探测技术的需求。
tie: Moving target detection method and system based on same platform and multiple sensors
absc: 本发明公开一种基于同平台多传感器的运动目标探测方法和系统。单片面阵传感器上相互独立的n个图像传感器组成传感器组，布局为沿卫星飞行方向在同一直线上等间距设置n个传感器。该方法包括多个传感器分别采集图像数据；对每个传感器所采集的图像数据进行星上预处理；从接收到的预处理后的数据获取图像，对来自不同传感器的图像进行运算处理从而识别运动目标。该系统包括依次相连的传感器组、图像数据预处理装置和无线发送装置，与无线发送装置无线连接的无线接收装置、以及与无线接收装置相连的运动目标识别装置。该方法运算效率高，便于下一步在星上实现，可确保运动目标探测的性能和精度。可满足减灾救灾等应急响应对运动目标探测技术的需求。
abse: The invention discloses a moving target detection method and system based on the same platform and multiple sensors. Mutually independent n image sensors on a single planar array sensor form a sensor group, and the n sensors are equidistantly arranged on the same straight line along the satellite flight direction. The method includes the steps: respectively acquiring image data by the multiple sensors; performing satellite pre-processing for the image data acquired by each sensor; acquiring images from the received pre-processed data, and operating the images from different sensors to recognize a moving target. The system comprises the sensor group, an image data pre-processing device, a wireless transmitting device, a wireless receiving device and a moving target recognition device, wherein the sensor group, the image data pre-processing device and the wireless transmitting device are sequentially connected, the wireless receiving device is wirelessly connected with the wireless transmitting device, and the moving target recognition device is connected with the wireless receiving device. The method is high in operation efficiency, satellite implementation in a next step is facilitated, and moving target detection performance and precision can be ensured. The requirement of emergency response of disaster reduction and relief and the like for moving target detection technology can be met.

abso: 本发明公开了一种来源于苔藓植物的抗旱蛋白PpLEA3-25及其编码基因和应用。本发明提供的蛋白质，来自小立碗藓（Physcomitrella？patens），命名为PpLEA3-25蛋白，是如下（a）或（b）：（a）由序列表中序列1所示的氨基酸序列组成的蛋白质；（b）将序列1的氨基酸序列经过一个或几个氨基酸残基的取代和/或缺失和/或添加且与植物抗旱能力相关的由序列1衍生的蛋白质。PpLEA3-25蛋白及其编码基因可以提高植物的耐旱性。本发明对培育抗旱植物新品种，特别是培育抗旱水稻新品种具有重要的理论及实际意义。
tie: Drought resisting protein PpLEA3-25 (Pogonatherum paniceum Late Embryogenesis Abundant 3-25) derived from bryophyte as well as coding gene and application thereof
absc: 本发明公开了一种来源于苔藓植物的抗旱蛋白PpLEA3-25及其编码基因和应用。本发明提供的蛋白质，来自小立碗藓（Physcomitrella？patens），命名为PpLEA3-25蛋白，是如下（a）或（b）：（a）由序列表中序列1所示的氨基酸序列组成的蛋白质；（b）将序列1的氨基酸序列经过一个或几个氨基酸残基的取代和/或缺失和/或添加且与植物抗旱能力相关的由序列1衍生的蛋白质。PpLEA3-25蛋白及其编码基因可以提高植物的耐旱性。本发明对培育抗旱植物新品种，特别是培育抗旱水稻新品种具有重要的理论及实际意义。
abse: The invention discloses a drought resisting protein PpLEA3-25 (Pogonatherum paniceum Late Embryogenesis Abundant 3-25) derived from bryophyte as well as a coding gene and application thereof. The protein provided by the invention is derived from Physcomitrella patens, is named as a PpLEA3-25 protein, and is (a) or (b), (a) a protein consisting of an amino acid sequence shown in a sequence 1 in a sequence table; (b) is a protein relevant to drought resisting capacity of a plant, which is derived from a sequence 1 by virtue of substitution and/or deficiency and/or addition of one or more amino acid residues on an amino acid sequence of the sequence 1. According to the drought resisting protein PpLEA3-25, as well as the coding gene and the application thereof, the drought resistance of the plant can be improved. The drought resisting protein PpLEA3-25 has an important theoretical and practical signficiance for cultivating new varieties of drought resisting plants, especially, cultivating new varieties of drought resisting rice.
tio: 来源于苔藓植物的抗旱蛋白PpLEA3-25及其编码基因和应用

abso: 本发明公开一种基于全景相机的单像自定位方法及系统，包括：获取全景影像中控制点坐标、全景相机系统的俯仰角和全景相机系统的翻滚角；利用控制点坐标、全景相机系统的俯仰角和翻滚角，计算得到控制点的局部极坐标；利用局部极坐标，计算得到控制点的局部空间坐标；获取全景相机系统的方向向量，计算全景相机系统在全局坐标系的航向角；利用航向角，获得旋转矩阵M；利用控制点的局部极坐标、局部空间坐标以及旋转矩阵M得到全景相机全局坐标。本申请的自定位方法运算量小、精度较高，可用于移动测量系统的实时自定位。
tie: It is a kind of single as method for self-locating and system based on panorama camera
absc: 本发明公开一种基于全景相机的单像自定位方法及系统，包括：获取全景影像中控制点坐标、全景相机系统的俯仰角和全景相机系统的翻滚角；利用控制点坐标、全景相机系统的俯仰角和翻滚角，计算得到控制点的局部极坐标；利用局部极坐标，计算得到控制点的局部空间坐标；获取全景相机系统的方向向量，计算全景相机系统在全局坐标系的航向角；利用航向角，获得旋转矩阵M；利用控制点的局部极坐标、局部空间坐标以及旋转矩阵M得到全景相机全局坐标。本申请的自定位方法运算量小、精度较高，可用于移动测量系统的实时自定位。
abse: The present invention discloses a kind of single as method for self-locating and system based on panorama camera, comprising: obtains control point coordinates, the roll angle of the pitch angle of panorama camera system and panorama camera system in full-view image；Using control point coordinates, the pitch angle of panorama camera system and roll angle, the local polar coordinates at control point are calculated；Using local polar coordinates, the local spatial coordinate at control point is calculated；The direction vector of panorama camera system is obtained, calculates panorama camera system in the course angle of global coordinate system；Using course angle, spin matrix M is obtained；Panorama camera world coordinates is obtained using the local polar coordinates, local spatial coordinate and spin matrix M at control point.The method for self-locating operand of the application is small, precision is higher, can be used for the real-time self-positioning of traverse measurement system.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于滚动式扫描的高光谱成像装置，该装置设置在匀速飞行的飞行平台上；该装置包括马达、转动轴、滚筒、高光谱相机、彩色相机；马达设置在飞行平台上；转动轴的一端与马达连接，另一端与滚筒连接；高光谱相机和彩色相机以滚筒的中心轴为对称轴对称设置在滚筒的表面；马达驱动转动轴带动滚筒以固定速度进行360°旋转滚动，使得高光谱相机和彩色相机的成像速度均匀，影像幅宽大。另外，该装置还包括根据实际成像需求确定高光谱相机和彩色相机成像范围的相机成像范围确定机构，使该装置的扫描视场角灵活可控。因此，本发明提供的高光谱成像装置，具有结构简单、成像速度均匀、影像幅宽大、扫描视场角灵活可控，应用范围广等优点。
tie: A kind of Hyperspectral imaging devices based on roller scanning
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于滚动式扫描的高光谱成像装置，该装置设置在匀速飞行的飞行平台上；该装置包括马达、转动轴、滚筒、高光谱相机、彩色相机；马达设置在飞行平台上；转动轴的一端与马达连接，另一端与滚筒连接；高光谱相机和彩色相机以滚筒的中心轴为对称轴对称设置在滚筒的表面；马达驱动转动轴带动滚筒以固定速度进行360°旋转滚动，使得高光谱相机和彩色相机的成像速度均匀，影像幅宽大。另外，该装置还包括根据实际成像需求确定高光谱相机和彩色相机成像范围的相机成像范围确定机构，使该装置的扫描视场角灵活可控。因此，本发明提供的高光谱成像装置，具有结构简单、成像速度均匀、影像幅宽大、扫描视场角灵活可控，应用范围广等优点。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of Hyperspectral imaging devices based on roller scanning, which is arranged on the flying platform to fly at a constant speed；The device includes motor, rotation axis, roller, EO-1 hyperion camera, color camera；Motor is arranged on flying platform；One end of rotation axis is connect with motor, and the other end is connect with roller；EO-1 hyperion camera and color camera are symmetricly set on the surface of roller using the central shaft of roller as symmetry axis；Motor driving rotation axis drives roller to rotate 360 ° rolling with fixed speed so that the image taking speed of EO-1 hyperion camera and color camera is uniform, and image breadth is big.In addition, the device further includes determining that the camera imaging range of EO-1 hyperion camera and color camera areas imaging determines mechanism according to actual imaging demand, keep the scanning field of view angle of the device flexibly controllable.Therefore, Hyperspectral imaging devices provided by the invention have many advantages, such as that simple in structure, image taking speed is uniform, image breadth is big, scanning field of view angle is flexibly controllable, have a wide range of application.

abso: 本发明提供一种应用太赫兹频域光谱技术检测粮食中氨基酸含量的方法，通过将待测粮食样品研磨后压片，直接采用太赫兹时域光谱系统在透射测量模式、氮气氛围下对其进行测试，得到样品的太赫兹时域光谱信号，时域光谱经过傅里叶变换后得到样品的频域光谱，对所得的各个频域谱进行归一化光谱预处理，最后将所述待测粮食压片样品的经过预处理的频域谱划分为校正集样本频域谱和验证集样本频域谱，用偏最小二乘回归法建立定量分析模型，获得各所述待测粮食样品的定量检测值。本发明所述方法样品制备简单，操作简单，能够真实、有效地实现对粮食中的氨基酸进行快速准确的定量检测。
tie: Using the method for Terahertz frequency domain spectra technology for detection Amino-Acid in Grain content
absc: 本发明提供一种应用太赫兹频域光谱技术检测粮食中氨基酸含量的方法，通过将待测粮食样品研磨后压片，直接采用太赫兹时域光谱系统在透射测量模式、氮气氛围下对其进行测试，得到样品的太赫兹时域光谱信号，时域光谱经过傅里叶变换后得到样品的频域光谱，对所得的各个频域谱进行归一化光谱预处理，最后将所述待测粮食压片样品的经过预处理的频域谱划分为校正集样本频域谱和验证集样本频域谱，用偏最小二乘回归法建立定量分析模型，获得各所述待测粮食样品的定量检测值。本发明所述方法样品制备简单，操作简单，能够真实、有效地实现对粮食中的氨基酸进行快速准确的定量检测。
abse: The present invention provides a kind of method of application Terahertz frequency domain spectra technology for detection Amino-Acid in Grain content, tabletting after by the way that grain samples to be measured are ground, directly using terahertz time-domain spectroscopy system in transmission measurement pattern, it is tested under nitrogen atmosphere, obtain the terahertz time-domain spectroscopy signal of sample, time-domain spectroscopy obtains the frequency domain spectra of sample after Fourier transformation, Pretreated spectra is normalized in each frequency domain spectra to gained, the frequency domain spectra by pretreatment of the grain press sheet compression to be measured is finally divided into calibration set sample frequency domain spectra and checking collection sample frequency domain spectra, Quantitative Analysis Model is set up with partial least-squares regression method, obtain the quantitative detected value of each grain samples to be measured.The method of the invention sample preparation is simple, simple to operate, can truly, effectively realize and the amino acid in grain fast and accurately quantitatively detected.

abso: 本发明涉及一种CT图像的硬化伪影校正方法，步骤如下：计算获得CT投影数据；对CT投影数据进行图像重建；重建的断层CT图像中指定相同材质的区域；获取硬化校正参数；利用硬化校正参数对CT投影数据进行硬化校正；通过重建模块对硬化校正后的CT投影数据进行图像重建，即可获得硬化伪影校正后的被测物体三维CT图像。本发明方法简单、操作方便、易于实施，而且该方法不需要预先扫描模体，直接利用被测物本身信息进行校正；该方法不需要对图像进行分割获取模板，只需要以交互方式指定重建图像中密度应该均匀的区域即可；该方法在拟合的过程中加入了硬化校正曲线的特性作为约束，使得拟合过程更加鲁棒。
tie: A kind of hardening artifact bearing calibration of CT image
absc: 本发明涉及一种CT图像的硬化伪影校正方法，步骤如下：计算获得CT投影数据；对CT投影数据进行图像重建；重建的断层CT图像中指定相同材质的区域；获取硬化校正参数；利用硬化校正参数对CT投影数据进行硬化校正；通过重建模块对硬化校正后的CT投影数据进行图像重建，即可获得硬化伪影校正后的被测物体三维CT图像。本发明方法简单、操作方便、易于实施，而且该方法不需要预先扫描模体，直接利用被测物本身信息进行校正；该方法不需要对图像进行分割获取模板，只需要以交互方式指定重建图像中密度应该均匀的区域即可；该方法在拟合的过程中加入了硬化校正曲线的特性作为约束，使得拟合过程更加鲁棒。
abse: The present invention relates to a kind of hardening artifact bearing calibrations of CT image, and steps are as follows: calculating and obtain CT data for projection；Image reconstruction is carried out to CT data for projection；The region of same material is specified in the tomography CT image of reconstruction；Obtain hardening correcting parameters；Hardening correcting is carried out to CT data for projection using hardening correcting parameters；Image reconstruction is carried out to the CT data for projection after hardening correcting by rebuilding module, the testee three-dimensional CT image after can be obtained hardening artifact correction.The method of the present invention is simple and convenient to operate, is easy to implement, and this method does not need previously-scanned die body, is directly corrected using measured object self-information；This method does not need to be split image acquisition template, it is only necessary to interactively specify density in reconstruction image should uniform region；This method joined the characteristic of hardening correcting curve as constraint, so that fit procedure is more robust during fitting.

tie: Hyperspectral imaging device based on rolling type scanning
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于滚动式扫描的高光谱成像装置，该装置设置在匀速飞行的飞行平台上；该装置包括马达、转动轴、滚筒、高光谱相机、彩色相机；马达设置在飞行平台上；转动轴的一端与马达连接，另一端与滚筒连接；高光谱相机和彩色相机以滚筒的中心轴为对称轴对称设置在滚筒的表面；马达驱动转动轴带动滚筒以固定速度进行360°旋转滚动，使得高光谱相机和彩色相机的成像速度均匀，影像幅宽大。另外，该装置还包括根据实际成像需求确定高光谱相机和彩色相机成像范围的相机成像范围确定机构，使该装置的扫描视场角灵活可控。因此，本发明提供的高光谱成像装置，具有结构简单、成像速度均匀、影像幅宽大、扫描视场角灵活可控，应用范围广等优点。
abse: The invention discloses a hyperspectral imaging device based on rolling scanning, which is arranged on a flying platform flying at a constant speed; the device comprises a motor, a rotating shaft, a roller, a hyperspectral camera and a color camera; the motor is arranged on the flying platform; one end of the rotating shaft is connected with the motor, and the other end of the rotating shaft is connected with the roller; the hyperspectral camera and the color camera are symmetrically arranged on the surface of the roller by taking the central shaft of the roller as a symmetry axis; the motor drives the rotating shaft to drive the roller to rotate and roll for 360 degrees at a fixed speed, so that the imaging speed of the hyperspectral camera and the color camera is uniform, and the image width is large. In addition, the device also comprises a camera imaging range determining mechanism for determining the imaging ranges of the hyperspectral camera and the color camera according to the actual imaging requirements, so that the scanning field angle of the device is flexible and controllable. Therefore, the hyperspectral imaging device provided by the invention has the advantages of simple structure, uniform imaging speed, large image width, flexible and controllable scanning field angle, wide application range and the like.

abso: 本发明公开了一种超分辨率图像传感器及其构造方法。该图像传感器包括像敏单元阵列及覆盖在该像敏单元阵列上的微透镜阵列，像敏单元阵列上各像敏单元行相互对齐，微透镜阵列上相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移，基准行上的各微透镜与基准行上的各像敏单元在覆盖方向上中心对齐。超分辨率图像传感器的构造方法包括：制造各像敏单元行相互对齐的像敏单元阵列；制造相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移的微透镜阵列；将微透镜阵列覆盖在像敏单元阵列上并集成起来，以使基准像敏单元行中各像敏单元的中心与基准的微透镜行中各微透镜单元的中心对齐。本发明的技术方案可用于实现分辨率的提升且在工程上更易于实现。
tie: Super-resolution image sensor and construction method thereof
absc: 本发明公开了一种超分辨率图像传感器及其构造方法。该图像传感器包括像敏单元阵列及覆盖在该像敏单元阵列上的微透镜阵列，像敏单元阵列上各像敏单元行相互对齐，微透镜阵列上相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移，基准行上的各微透镜与基准行上的各像敏单元在覆盖方向上中心对齐。超分辨率图像传感器的构造方法包括：制造各像敏单元行相互对齐的像敏单元阵列；制造相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移的微透镜阵列；将微透镜阵列覆盖在像敏单元阵列上并集成起来，以使基准像敏单元行中各像敏单元的中心与基准的微透镜行中各微透镜单元的中心对齐。本发明的技术方案可用于实现分辨率的提升且在工程上更易于实现。
abse: The invention discloses a super-resolution image sensor and a construction method thereof. The image sensor comprises a pixel sensitive unit array and a micro-lens array covered on the pixel sensitive unit array; various pixel sensitive units on the pixel sensitive unit array are aligned with each other; other various micro-lens rows relative to a reference micro-lens row on the micro-lens array regularly shift step by step, and various micro lenses on a reference row are centrally aligned with various pixel sensitive units on the reference row in a covering direction. The construction method of the super-resolution image sensor comprises the following steps: manufacturing the pixel sensitive unit array with various aligned pixel sensitive unit rows; manufacturing the micro-lens array, wherein other various micro-lens rows relative to the reference micro-lens row regularly shift step by step; and covering the micro-lens array on the pixel sensitive unit array and integrating, so that the center of various pixel sensitive units in the reference pixel sensitive unit row is aligned with the center of various micro-lens units in the reference micro-lens row. The technical scheme of the invention can be used for realizing the improvement of resolution and is more easily realized in engineering.

abso: 本发明涉及红外热波无损检测技术，尤其是在红外热波无损检测过程中提高被测物体表面吸收率和发射率的方法及其装置。方法的特征在于在红外热波无损检测过程中，选用具有较好可见光吸收率和红外发射率的功能薄膜，包裹或覆盖被测物体，并通过将被测物体表面和薄膜之间空气抽掉的方法使功能膜和被测物体紧密接触。针对被测物体大小的不同，本发明提供了两种实现上述方法的装置。本发明能够实现检测过程中对被检测物体完全无污损的同时，还能提高被测物体对可见光的吸收率和红外发射率，从而大大提高红外热波无损检测对表面反射率较高且不可进行喷漆处理的物体的检测效果适用于对易腐蚀或者精密航天、航空器件的红外热波无损检测。
tie: Method and apparatus for improving absorptivity and emissivity in infrared thermal wave non-destructive testing
absc: 本发明涉及红外热波无损检测技术，尤其是在红外热波无损检测过程中提高被测物体表面吸收率和发射率的方法及其装置。方法的特征在于在红外热波无损检测过程中，选用具有较好可见光吸收率和红外发射率的功能薄膜，包裹或覆盖被测物体，并通过将被测物体表面和薄膜之间空气抽掉的方法使功能膜和被测物体紧密接触。针对被测物体大小的不同，本发明提供了两种实现上述方法的装置。本发明能够实现检测过程中对被检测物体完全无污损的同时，还能提高被测物体对可见光的吸收率和红外发射率，从而大大提高红外热波无损检测对表面反射率较高且不可进行喷漆处理的物体的检测效果适用于对易腐蚀或者精密航天、航空器件的红外热波无损检测。
abse: The invention relates to a method and apparatus for improving the surface absorbing ratio and emissive power during the infrared heat wave nondestructive testing course in the field of infrared heat wave nondestructive test. It is characterized in that it chooses the function thin foil with better light absorbing ratio and emissive power to cover or coat the tested object and uses the method of drafting the air between the tested object surface and the thin foil to make them closed contact with each other during the infrared heat wave nondestructive testing course. The invention provides two apparatus to achieve the method by the size of the tested object.

abso: 本发明公开了一种同平台上不同分辨率的传感器联合动目标检测系统及其检测方法，该系统包括安装在同一个卫星平台上的具有第一分辨率的第一传感器和具有第二分辨率的第二传感器，其中第一分辨率低于第二分辨率。第二传感器垂直朝向地面成像，第一传感器沿着卫星运动方向呈前仰角成像，第一传感器和第二传感器均与中央控制器相连。该方法包括：第一传感器持续捕获地面图像并检测图像中是否存在疑似运动目标，如果存在疑似运动目标则通知中央控制器启动第二传感器；第二传感器收到启动命令并开始捕获地面图像进行运动目标确认。本发明在提高了运动目标捕获概率的同时减小了星上数据存储量。
tie: Same-platform different-resolution sensor combined moving target detection system and detection method
absc: 本发明公开了一种同平台上不同分辨率的传感器联合动目标检测系统及其检测方法，该系统包括安装在同一个卫星平台上的具有第一分辨率的第一传感器和具有第二分辨率的第二传感器，其中第一分辨率低于第二分辨率。第二传感器垂直朝向地面成像，第一传感器沿着卫星运动方向呈前仰角成像，第一传感器和第二传感器均与中央控制器相连。该方法包括：第一传感器持续捕获地面图像并检测图像中是否存在疑似运动目标，如果存在疑似运动目标则通知中央控制器启动第二传感器；第二传感器收到启动命令并开始捕获地面图像进行运动目标确认。本发明在提高了运动目标捕获概率的同时减小了星上数据存储量。
abse: The invention discloses a system and a method for detecting moving targets by combining sensors with different resolutions on the same platform. The second sensor is vertically towards the ground for imaging, the first sensor is in front elevation angle imaging along the satellite motion direction, and the first sensor and the second sensor are both connected with the central controller. The method comprises the following steps: the first sensor continuously captures a ground image and detects whether a suspected moving target exists in the image, and if the suspected moving target exists, the central controller is informed to start the second sensor; the second sensor receives the start command and starts capturing ground images for moving object confirmation. The invention improves the capturing probability of the moving target and reduces the data storage capacity on the satellite.

abso: 一种脉冲红外热波技术测厚度或缺陷深度的方法，包括如下步骤：(1)使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列，并将热图序列存储在通用存储器中；(2)对热图序列中每个点的温度时间曲线乘上对应时间的从而获得新的曲线f；(3)对f求一阶微分，并获得其峰值时间tapst；(4)由公式则求出L，其中α为热扩散系数，L为被测物体厚度或缺陷深度。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量出被测件厚度或缺陷深度，不需要参考曲线，且仅需进行一次微分处理即可，处理方法更为简单。
tie: Method for measuring thickness by pulse infrared thermal wave technology
absc: 一种脉冲红外热波技术测厚度或缺陷深度的方法，包括如下步骤：(1)使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列，并将热图序列存储在通用存储器中；(2)对热图序列中每个点的温度时间曲线乘上对应时间的从而获得新的曲线f；(3)对f求一阶微分，并获得其峰值时间tapst；(4)由公式则求出L，其中α为热扩散系数，L为被测物体厚度或缺陷深度。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量出被测件厚度或缺陷深度，不需要参考曲线，且仅需进行一次微分处理即可，处理方法更为简单。
abse: The invention provides a method for measuring thickness or defect depth by a pulse infrared thermal wave technology, comprising the following steps of (1) heating an object to be measured by pulse heating equipment; obtaining a thermographic sequence on the surface of the object to be measured by an infrared thermal imaging device; memorizing the thermographic sequence in a general memory; (2) multiplying a temperature-time curve of each point in the thermaographic sequence with corresponding time, thus obtaining a new curve f; (3) working out first-order differential on the f; and obtaining a peak time tapst; (4) working out L by a formula, wherein Alpha is thermal diffusion coefficient and L is the thickness or the defect depth of the object to be measured. By adopting the technical scheme, the thickness or detect depth of a part to be measured can be measured, a reference curve is not needed, and only one-order differential treatment is needed for the measurement, so that the processing method is simpler.

abso: 本发明提供了一种获取亚像素位移序列图像的方法及系统，该方法通过确定倾斜模态成像过程中面阵CMOS传感器倾斜角度和积分级数M，进而确定面阵CMOS传感器沿轨方向的开窗尺寸s；获取目标区域的亚像素位移序列图像和确定亚像素位移序列图像的横纵向位移与理论值的差异值，并判断差异值是否小于设定的误差门限阈值；若是，则确定获取的亚像素位移序列图像可用于超分辨重构，实现在时间延迟积分电荷耦合器件推扫成像中，产生用于超分辨重构的具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像，进而利用具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像通过超分辨重构算法达到在原有载荷量级基础上提升图像分辨率的目的。
tie: A kind of method and system for obtaining Displacement sequence image
absc: 本发明提供了一种获取亚像素位移序列图像的方法及系统，该方法通过确定倾斜模态成像过程中面阵CMOS传感器倾斜角度和积分级数M，进而确定面阵CMOS传感器沿轨方向的开窗尺寸s；获取目标区域的亚像素位移序列图像和确定亚像素位移序列图像的横纵向位移与理论值的差异值，并判断差异值是否小于设定的误差门限阈值；若是，则确定获取的亚像素位移序列图像可用于超分辨重构，实现在时间延迟积分电荷耦合器件推扫成像中，产生用于超分辨重构的具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像，进而利用具有不同亚像素位移的序列图像通过超分辨重构算法达到在原有载荷量级基础上提升图像分辨率的目的。
abse: The invention provides a kind of method and system for obtaining Displacement sequence image, the method is by face battle array cmos sensor angle of inclination and integration series M during determination inclination modality, and then determination face gust cmos sensor is along the window size s in rail direction；Obtain the Displacement sequence image of target area and determine the transverse and longitudinal displacement of Displacement sequence image and the difference value of theoretical value, and judge difference value whether less than the error threshold threshold value for setting；If, then determine that the Displacement sequence image for obtaining can be used for super-resolution reconstruct, realize in time delay integration charge-coupled image sensor push-scanning image, the sequence image with different Displacements for super-resolution reconstruct is produced, and then reaches the purpose that image resolution ratio is lifted on the basis of original load magnitude by super-resolution restructing algorithm using the sequence image with different Displacements.

tie: A kind of super-resolution image sensor and its building method
absc: 本发明公开了一种超分辨率图像传感器及其构造方法。该图像传感器包括像敏单元阵列及覆盖在该像敏单元阵列上的微透镜阵列，像敏单元阵列上各像敏单元行相互对齐，微透镜阵列上相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移，基准行上的各微透镜与基准行上的各像敏单元在覆盖方向上中心对齐。超分辨率图像传感器的构造方法包括：制造各像敏单元行相互对齐的像敏单元阵列；制造相对于基准的微透镜行其余各微透镜行有规律地逐步偏移的微透镜阵列；将微透镜阵列覆盖在像敏单元阵列上并集成起来，以使基准像敏单元行中各像敏单元的中心与基准的微透镜行中各微透镜单元的中心对齐。本发明的技术方案可用于实现分辨率的提升且在工程上更易于实现。
abse: The invention discloses a kind of super-resolution image sensor and its building methods.The imaging sensor includes image-sensitive cell array and the microlens array that is covered in the image-sensitive cell array, each image-sensitive cell row is mutually aligned in image-sensitive cell array, relative to the lenticule row of benchmark, remaining each lenticule row is regularly gradually deviated on microlens array, and each lenticule in reference row is aligned with each image-sensitive unit center in coverage direction in reference row.The building method of super-resolution image sensor includes: the image-sensitive cell array that each image-sensitive cell row of manufacture is mutually aligned；Manufacture the microlens array regularly gradually deviated relative to the lenticule row of benchmark remaining each lenticule row；Microlens array is covered in image-sensitive cell array and is integrated, so that the center of each image-sensitive unit is aligned with the center of each lenticule unit in the lenticule row of benchmark in benchmark image-sensitive cell row.Technical solution of the present invention can be used for realizing the promotion of resolution ratio and be more easily implemented in engineering.

abso: 本发明公开负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法、用途及其在芦苇茎枯病原菌中荧光示踪的应用，负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法包括如下步骤：(1)载体材料的制备：制备介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料作为载体材料；(2)将农药吡唑醚菌酯负载在介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料上，得负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品。制备出的农药吡唑醚菌酯载药体系可以负载和释放吡唑醚菌酯，可用于抑制芦苇茎枯病病原菌，并且可用于载药体系在芦苇茎枯病病原菌中的荧光示踪。
tie: Preparation method and application of pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample as well as application of pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample in fluorescent tracing of pathogenic bacteria of asparagus stem blight
absc: 本发明公开负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法、用途及其在芦苇茎枯病原菌中荧光示踪的应用，负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品的制备方法包括如下步骤：(1)载体材料的制备：制备介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料作为载体材料；(2)将农药吡唑醚菌酯负载在介孔二氧化硅碳量子点材料上，得负载农药吡唑醚菌酯样品。制备出的农药吡唑醚菌酯载药体系可以负载和释放吡唑醚菌酯，可用于抑制芦苇茎枯病病原菌，并且可用于载药体系在芦苇茎枯病病原菌中的荧光示踪。
abse: The invention discloses a preparation method and an application of a pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample as well as the application of the pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample in fluorescent tracing of pathogenic bacteria of asparagus stem blight. The preparation method of the pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample comprises the following steps: (1) preparation of a supporter material: a mesoporous silica carbon quantum dot material is prepared as the supporter material; (2) the pesticide pyraclostrobin is supported on the mesoporous silica carbon quantum dot material, and the pesticide pyraclostrobin supported sample is obtained. The prepared pesticide pyraclostrobin supported system can support and release pyraclostrobin, can be used for inhibiting the pathogenic bacteria of asparagus stem blight and can be applied to fluorescent tracing of the pathogenic bacteria of asparagus stem blight.

abso: 一种脉冲红外热波技术测厚度或缺陷深度的方法，包括如下步骤：(1)使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列，并将热图序列存储在通用存储器中；(2)对热图序列中每个点的温度时间曲线乘上对应时间的从而获得新的曲线f；(3)对f求一阶微分，并获得其峰值时间tapst；(4)由公式则求出L，其中α为热扩散系数，L为被测物体厚度或缺陷深度。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量出被测件厚度或缺陷深度，不需要参考曲线，且仅需进行一次微分处理即可，处理方法更为简单。
tie: Method for measuring thickness by pulse infrared thermal wave technology
absc: 一种脉冲红外热波技术测厚度或缺陷深度的方法，包括如下步骤：(1)使用脉冲加热设备对被测物体进行加热，同时使用红外热像装置获得被测物体表面的热图序列，并将热图序列存储在通用存储器中；(2)对热图序列中每个点的温度时间曲线乘上对应时间的从而获得新的曲线f；(3)对f求一阶微分，并获得其峰值时间tapst；(4)由公式则求出L，其中α为热扩散系数，L为被测物体厚度或缺陷深度。本发明通过上述技术方案，可以测量出被测件厚度或缺陷深度，不需要参考曲线，且仅需进行一次微分处理即可，处理方法更为简单。
abse: The invention provides a method for measuring thickness or defect depth by a pulse infrared thermal wave technology, comprising the following steps of (1) heating an object to be measured by pulse heating equipment; obtaining a thermographic sequence on the surface of the object to be measured by an infrared thermal imaging device; memorizing the thermographic sequence in a general memory; (2) multiplying a temperature-time curve of each point in the thermaographic sequence with corresponding time, thus obtaining a new curve f; (3) working out first-order differential on the f; and obtaining a peak time tapst; (4) working out L by a formula, wherein Alpha is thermal diffusion coefficient and L is the thickness or the defect depth of the object to be measured. By adopting the technical scheme, the thickness or detect depth of a part to be measured can be measured, a reference curve is not needed, and only one-order differential treatment is needed for the measurement, so that the processing method is simpler.

abso: 本发明公开了一种基于多特征融合的热红外遥感影像的海上运动目标检测方法。该方法包括：对热红外影像进行海陆分割获得海域影像；利用先验分割参数对海域影像进行多尺度分割得到对象；提取分割得到的对象的亮度和几何特征；通过将得到的分割对象的亮度和几何特征分别对照训练得到的对应的分类规则对分割对象进行决策树分类，从而实现海上运动目标的检测。本发明利用热红外遥感影像作为数据源，能够弥补可见/近红外多光谱影像夜间失效、SAR影像目视解译困难且处理步骤复杂等现有方法的缺点，有利于对检测结果的检验，进一步提高信息准确性；基于检测得到的海上运动目标提取得到的温度信息，有利于对海上运动目标的状态进行判别。
tie: Offshore moving target detection method based on multi-feature fusion thermal infrared remote sensing image
absc: 本发明公开了一种基于多特征融合的热红外遥感影像的海上运动目标检测方法。该方法包括：对热红外影像进行海陆分割获得海域影像；利用先验分割参数对海域影像进行多尺度分割得到对象；提取分割得到的对象的亮度和几何特征；通过将得到的分割对象的亮度和几何特征分别对照训练得到的对应的分类规则对分割对象进行决策树分类，从而实现海上运动目标的检测。本发明利用热红外遥感影像作为数据源，能够弥补可见/近红外多光谱影像夜间失效、SAR影像目视解译困难且处理步骤复杂等现有方法的缺点，有利于对检测结果的检验，进一步提高信息准确性；基于检测得到的海上运动目标提取得到的温度信息，有利于对海上运动目标的状态进行判别。
abse: The invention discloses a method for detecting a moving target on the sea based on a multi-feature fusion thermal infrared remote sensing image. The method comprises the following steps: carrying out sea-land segmentation on the thermal infrared image to obtain a sea area image; carrying out multi-scale segmentation on the sea area image by using the prior segmentation parameters to obtain an object; extracting brightness and geometric characteristics of the segmented object; and performing decision tree classification on the segmented objects by respectively contrasting the obtained brightness and geometric characteristics of the segmented objects with the corresponding classification rules obtained by training, thereby realizing the detection of the marine moving target. The method utilizes the thermal infrared remote sensing image as a data source, can make up the defects of the existing methods such as night failure of the visible/near infrared multispectral image, difficult visual interpretation of the SAR image, complex processing steps and the like, is favorable for the inspection of the detection result, and further improves the information accuracy; the temperature information extracted based on the detected marine moving target is beneficial to distinguishing the state of the marine moving target.
